[\[23b.6\]]ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[23b.7\]]las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_sa'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_chu'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dang /_rlung gi khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_nam mkha'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_ma rig pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[24a.2\]]rnam par shes pa mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_skye mched drug [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_reg pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_tshor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_srid pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_len 
[\[24a.3\]]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_srid pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_rga shi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i 
[\[24a.4\]]tshul dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[24a.5\]]dang /_nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_phyi stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_chen po stong ba nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_don dam 
[\[24a.6\]]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[24a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 
[\[24b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_dbang po rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_stobs rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[24b.3\]]rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_lam [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_bsam gtan rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[24b.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par thar ba rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang 
[\[24b.5\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[24b.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_byams pa chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul dang /_snying rje chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[24b.7\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa de 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di las [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher 
[\[25a.2\]]bstan/_ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba bstan/_sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]
[\[25a.3\]]tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid 
[\[25a.4\]]stong ba nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[25a.5\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[25a.6\]]pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_
[\[25a.7\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs 
[\[25b.2\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag ni ci'i phyir bstan/_ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan cing /_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[25b.3\]]po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing /_des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can tu 'gyur ba yin/_ci'i phyir na des sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i 
[\[25b.4\]]rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[25b.5\]]las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba yin/_ci'i phyir na 'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ba 
[\[25b.6\]]yin/_ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs 
[\[25b.7\]]pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan pa yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher 
[\[26a.2\]]bstan to/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa 
[\[26a.3\]]gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[26a.4\]]phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[26a.5\]]theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/chos thams cad 
[\[26a.6\]]stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[26a.7\]]gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang 
[\[26b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[26b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' 
[\[26b.4\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[26b.5\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[26b.6\]]bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas 
[\[26b.7\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[27a.2\]]chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par 
[\[27a.3\]]shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu 
[\[27a.4\]]dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 
[\[27a.5\]]'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_
[\[27a.6\]]rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing /_khyad zhugs pa'i 
[\[27a.7\]]spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid 
[\[27b.2\]]dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma 
[\[27b.3\]]dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[27b.4\]]dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan 
[\[27b.5\]]lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_
[\[27b.6\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa 
[\[27b.7\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la 
[\[28a.2\]]yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_
[\[28a.3\]]mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[28a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa 
[\[28a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro 
[\[28a.6\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba [{]bstand [,]bstan [}]to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas/_sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[28a.7\]{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[28b.2\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar 
[\[28b.3\]]gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi 
[\[28b.4\]]dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[28b.5\]]mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[28b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab 
[\[28b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[29a.2\]]las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[29a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i 
[\[29a.4\]]spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba [{]bstand [,]bstan [}]to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas 
[\[29a.5\]]sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[29a.6\]]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong ba nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus 
[\[29a.7\]]byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang 
[\[29b.2\]]po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[29b.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[29b.4\]]thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[29b.5\]]dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 
[\[29b.6\]]cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 
[\[29b.7\]]la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[30a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel pa'i spobs 
[\[30a.3\]]pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba 
[\[30a.4\]]bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas/_sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[30a.5\]]pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa 
[\[30a.6\]]stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong 
[\[30a.7\]]pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[30b.2\]]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[30b.3\]]mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[30b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[30b.5\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[30b.6\]]gang gis/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[30b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs 
[\[31a.2\]]pa dang /_'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya 
[\[31a.3\]]pa/_bam po gsum pa/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 
[\[31a.4\]]'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong 
[\[31a.5\]]pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[31a.6\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo 
[\[31a.7\]]nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[31b.2\]]par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_
[\[31b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[31b.4\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[31b.5\]]chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar/_/
[\[31b.6\]]'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug 
[\[31b.7\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs 
[\[32a.2\]]pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin 
[\[32a.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[32a.4\]]phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha 
[\[32a.5\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[32a.6\]]dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[32a.7\]]yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs 
[\[32b.2\]]pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam 
[\[32b.3\]]par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/
[\[32b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 
[\[32b.5\]]phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa 
[\[32b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i 
[\[32b.7\]]spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas stong 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul 
[\[33a.2\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[33a.3\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong 
[\[33a.4\]]pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[33a.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_
[\[33a.6\]]bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[33a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems 
[\[33b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[33b.3\]]du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[33b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad [{]mkhyend [,]mkhyend [}]pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 
[\[33b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i 
[\[33b.6\]]spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[33b.7\]]po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[34a.2\]]chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[34a.3\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag 
[\[34a.4\]]par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 
[\[34a.5\]]dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[34a.6\]]shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[34a.7\]]kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse bdag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la/_yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas 
[\[34b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de 
[\[34b.3\]]yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[34b.4\]]chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_
[\[34b.5\]]'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang po 
[\[34b.6\]]bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_
[\[34b.7\]]bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[35a.2\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[35a.3\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[35a.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams 
[\[35a.5\]]cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang 
[\[35a.6\]]bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /_
[\[35a.7\]]rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa 
[\[35b.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[35b.3\]]po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs 
[\[35b.4\]]pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang 
[\[35b.5\]]po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[35b.6\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong 
[\[35b.7\]]pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 
[\[36a.2\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs 
[\[36a.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_
[\[36a.4\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[36a.5\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[36a.6\]{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas 
[\[36a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems 
[\[36b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel pa'i spobs pa dang /_
[\[36b.3\]]don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba 
[\[36b.4\]]bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas/_sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_
[\[36b.5\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[36b.6\]]dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[36b.7\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[37a.2\]]bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 
[\[37a.3\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[37a.4\]]par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba 
[\[37a.5\]]dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 
[\[37a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod 
[\[37a.7\]]pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs 
[\[37b.2\]]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad la mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur 
[\[37b.3\]]ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_
[\[37b.4\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang 
[\[37b.5\]]stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[37b.6\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo 
[\[37b.7\]]bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_
[\[38a.2\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so 
[\[38a.3\]]so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 
[\[38a.4\]]rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 
[\[38a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge 
[\[38a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[38a.7\]]mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rang 
[\[38b.2\]]gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba [{]bstand [,]bstan [}]to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_
[\[38b.3\]]tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[38b.4\]]dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong 
[\[38b.5\]]pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po 
[\[38b.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad 
[\[38b.7\]]pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]bar thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]smond [,]smon [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[39a.2\]]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[39a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la sbyong cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[39a.4\]]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge 
[\[39a.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[39a.6\]]mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_
[\[39a.7\]]mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]'gyur ro/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba [{]bstand [,]bstan [}]to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas/_sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[39b.2\]{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi 
[\[39b.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma 
[\[39b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[39b.5\]]dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[39b.6\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[39b.7\]]'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[40a.2\]]rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des 
[\[40a.3\]]na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir 
[\[40a.4\]]bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag_/chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma 
[\[40a.5\]]gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs pa'i tshul 
[\[40a.6\]]gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad 
[\[40a.7\]]las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam 
[\[40b.2\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas 
[\[40b.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan 
[\[40b.4\]]nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
[\[40b.5\]]pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[40b.6\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga 
[\[40b.7\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[41a.2\]]chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing /_
[\[41a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs 
[\[41a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad [{]mkhyend [,]mkhyend [}]pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam 
[\[41a.5\]]par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs 
[\[41a.6\]]pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang 
[\[41a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba [{]bstand [,]bstan [}]to/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas/_sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[41b.2\]]dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba 
[\[41b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[41b.4\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags 
[\[41b.5\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar ba'i 
[\[41b.6\]]sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so 
[\[41b.7\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la 
[\[42a.2\]]yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_
[\[42a.3\]]mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad [{]mkhyend [,]mkhyend [}]pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par 
[\[42a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_
[\[42a.5\]]rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs 
[\[42a.6\]]pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan te/_/sems dang po bskyed pa nas sems bcu ba bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub 
[\[42a.7\]]sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[42b.2\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[42b.3\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_
[\[42b.4\]]byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[42b.5\]]dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams 
[\[42b.6\]]cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dag kyang bstan/_byang chub 
[\[42b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/_des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la spyod cing /_rdzus te 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/_/des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[43a.2\]]ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya bar 'dod na de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa 
[\[43a.3\]]de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/'khrug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems
