[\[43a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_rgyun 'chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spobs pa dang /_mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang /_rigs pa'i spobs pa dang /_'brel ba'i spobs pa 
[\[43a.5\]]dang /_don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u bco lnga'o/_/
[\[43a.6\]]/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bzhi pa/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya phyin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis de ltar chos kyi char pa 
[\[43a.7\]]'di phab ste/_bstan na de la bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_me tog mngon par sprul pa bya ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang /_gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o/_/mngon par gtor bar bya'o/_/rab tu gtor bar bya'o/_/snyam mo/_/de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/_rgyal 
[\[43b.2\]]chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_mtshe ma'i lha dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha dang /_'phrul dga'i lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /_tshangs pa kun 
[\[43b.3\]]'khor gyi lha dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha dang /_snang ba'i lha dang /_chung snang gi lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /_dge ba'i lha dang /_chung dge'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha dang /_che ba'i 
[\[43b.4\]]lha dang /_chung che'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang 'di 
[\[43b.5\]]snyam du sems par gyur te/_de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis chos kyi char pa 'di phab ste/_bstan na de la bdag cag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/[ {]mye [,]me [}]tog mngon par sprul pa bya ste/_sangs 
[\[43b.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang /_gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor bar bya'o/_/mngon par gtor bar bya'o/_/rab tu gtor bar bya'o snyam mo/_/
[\[43b.7\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_mtshe ma'i lha dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha dang /_'phrul dga'i lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]dbang byed kyi lha dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha dang /_snang ba'i lha dang /_chung snang gi lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /_
[\[44a.2\]]dge ba'i lha dang /_chung dge'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha dang /_che ba'i lha dang /_chung che'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha dang /_shin tu mthong 
[\[44a.3\]]ba'i lha dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba mang po mngon par sprul te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub 
[\[44a.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang /_gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'thor bar gyur to/_/mngon par 'thor bar gyur to/_/rab tu 'thor bar gyur to/_/me tog de dag gis gtor ma thag tu stong 
[\[44a.5\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhi me tog gis khebs par gyur nas/_steng gi bar snang la yang me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mdangs dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba kun 
[\[44a.6\]]nas gnas par gyur to/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/_me tog 
[\[44a.7\]]'di dag ni sprul pa'o/_/'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin/_chu las skyes pa ma yin/_thang las skyes pa ma yin no/_/'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]dag ni yid las byung ba ste/_me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/_me tog 'di dag ni 
[\[44b.2\]]yid las byung ba ma yin no/_/ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ma skyes pa ste me tog 'di dag yid las byung ba ma yin/_ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni/_kau shi ka de ltar ma 
[\[44b.3\]]skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar zad dam/_'o ma tam gzugs kyang ma byung /_tshor ba yang ma byung /_'du shes kyang ma byung /_'du byed kyang ma byung /_rnam par 
[\[44b.4\]]shes pa yang ma byung ba yin/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar ma zad kyi/_kau shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/kau shi ka tshor ba yang ma byung ba ste/_gang ma 
[\[44b.5\]]byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'du shes kyang ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni 'du shes ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'du byed kyang ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa yang ma byung ba ste/_gang ma 
[\[44b.6\]]byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rna ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka sna ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sna ma yin no/_/
[\[44b.7\]]kau shi ka lce ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lce ma yin no/_/kau shi ka lus ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lus ma yin no/_/kau shi ka yid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni yid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/_
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no/_/kau shi ka sgra ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sgra ma yin no/_/kau shi ka dri ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni dri ma yin no/_/kau shi ka ro ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni ro ma yin 
[\[45a.2\]]no/_/kau shi ka reg ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni reg ma yin no/_/kau shi ka chos ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni chos ma yin no/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin 
[\[45a.3\]]no/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa 
[\[45a.4\]]ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung 
[\[45a.5\]]ba de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[45a.6\]]pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka lus kyi 
[\[45a.7\]]'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma 
[\[45b.2\]]yin no/_/kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lce'i 
[\[45b.3\]]'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma 
[\[45b.4\]]byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka chu'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni chu'i khams ma yin no/_/
[\[45b.5\]]kau shi ka [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rlung gi khams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rlung gi khams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka nam mkha'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni nam mkha'i 
[\[45b.6\]]khams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka ma rig pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni ma rig pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'du byed ni ma byung ba ste/_
[\[45b.7\]]gang ma byung ba de ni 'du byed ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ma yin no/_/kau shi ka skye mched 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]drug ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni skye mched drug ma yin no/_/kau shi ka reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni reg pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni tshor ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 
[\[46a.2\]]sred pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sred pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka len pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni len pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka srid pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni srid pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka skye ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang 
[\[46a.3\]]ma byung ba de ni skye ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rga shi ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rga shi ma yin no/_/kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu 
[\[46a.4\]]phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[46a.5\]]phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi 
[\[46a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni phyi 
[\[46a.7\]]stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka chen po stong pa 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni 'dus 
[\[46b.2\]]byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma 
[\[46b.3\]]yin no/_/kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi 
[\[46b.4\]]ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba 
[\[46b.5\]]ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni 
[\[46b.6\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[46b.7\]]stong pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams ma 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]yin no/_/kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka dbang po rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni dbang po rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka stobs 
[\[47a.2\]]rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni stobs rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma byung ba ste/_
[\[47a.3\]]gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka bsam gtan rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba 
[\[47a.4\]]de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms 
[\[47a.5\]]par 'jug pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rnam par thar ba brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar ba brgyad ma yin no/_/kau shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i 
[\[47a.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin no/_/
[\[47a.7\]]kau shi ka mngon par shes pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ma byung ba 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[47b.2\]]'jigs pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka byams pa chen po ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni byams pa chen po ma yin no/_/
[\[47b.3\]]kau shi ka snying rje chen po ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni snying rje chen po ma yin no/_/kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 
[\[47b.4\]]'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no/_/kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no/_/kau shi ka phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni 
[\[47b.5\]]ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no/_/kau shi ka dgra bcom pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rang byang chub ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rang byang chub ma 
[\[47b.6\]]yin no/_/kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/_/
[\[47b.7\]]kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]byung ba de ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba ma yin no/_/kau shi ka dgra bcom pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa ma yin no/_/kau shi ka rang sangs rgyas ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni rang sangs rgyas ma yin no/_/kau shi 
[\[48a.2\]]ka byang chub sems dpa' ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma byung ba ste/_gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam 
[\[48a.3\]]du sems par gyur te/_kye ma gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de ltar btags pa dang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal la/_chos nyid kyang ston pa ni shes rab zab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/
[\[48a.4\]]kau shi ka de de bzhin te/_gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa ste/_de ltar btags pa dang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal la/_chos nyid kyang ston to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[48a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di btags pa dang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal la/_chos nyid kyang ston pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi 
[\[48a.6\]]ka gzugs ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de 
[\[48a.7\]]ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka 'du shes ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka 'du byed ni btags 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor 
[\[48b.2\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal/_rnam par mi 'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal/_rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de/_gnas brtan rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyi sa 
[\[48b.3\]]bstan te/_'gal ba med do/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rna ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags 
[\[48b.4\]]pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka sna ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 
[\[48b.5\]]'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lce ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lus ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa 
[\[48b.6\]]tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka yid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar 
[\[48b.7\]]bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gzugs 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]ni btags pa tsam mo/_btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka sgra ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid 
[\[49a.2\]]de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka dri ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis mi 'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka ro ni btags pa tsam 
[\[49a.3\]]mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka reg ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[49a.4\]]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka chos ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin 
[\[49a.5\]]pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos 
[\[49a.6\]]nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/
[\[49a.7\]]kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal 
[\[49b.2\]]bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang 
[\[49b.3\]]yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de 
[\[49b.4\]]ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar 
[\[49b.5\]]bstan to/_/kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/
[\[49b.6\]]btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan 
[\[49b.7\]]rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[50a.2\]]ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa 
[\[50a.3\]]de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal 
[\[50a.4\]]bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[50a.5\]]kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa 
[\[50a.6\]]tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba 
[\[50a.7\]]de/_gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka sa'i khams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]kau shi ka chu'i khams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid 
[\[50b.2\]]de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rlung gi khams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka nam 
[\[50b.3\]]mkha'i khams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar [{]bstand [,]bstan [}]to/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin 
[\[50b.4\]]pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de/_gnas 
[\[50b.5\]]brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka ma rig pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka 'du byed ni btags 
[\[50b.6\]]pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni 
[\[50b.7\]]gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_kau shi ka skye 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]mched drug ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka reg pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang 
[\[51a.2\]]yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka tshor ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/
[\[51a.3\]]kau shi ka sred pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka len pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos 
[\[51a.4\]]nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka srid pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka 
[\[51a.5\]]skye ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rga shi ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de 
[\[51a.6\]]ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de/_gnas brtan rab 
[\[51a.7\]]'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka tshul khrims 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang 
[\[51b.2\]]yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[51b.3\]]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[51b.4\]]pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/
[\[51b.5\]]gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal 
[\[51b.6\]]bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags 
[\[51b.7\]]pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar [{]bstand [,]bstan [}]to/_/kau shi ka don dam pa 
[\[52a.2\]]stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de 
[\[52a.3\]]ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal 
[\[52a.4\]]bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[52a.5\]]ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos 
[\[52a.6\]]nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar 
[\[52a.7\]]bstan to/_/kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa 
[\[52b.2\]]de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal 
[\[52b.3\]]bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni 
[\[52b.4\]]btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/
[\[52b.5\]]gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de/_gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan 
[\[52b.6\]]rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rdzu 
[\[52b.7\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka dbang po rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka stobs rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 
[\[53a.2\]]'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam 
[\[53a.3\]]yan lag brgyad pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang 
[\[53a.4\]]yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka bsam gtan rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal 
[\[53a.5\]]bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 
[\[53a.6\]]btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam par thar pa brgyad ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_
[\[53a.7\]]de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de/_gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 
[\[53b.2\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka mngon par shes pa 
[\[53b.3\]]rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid 
[\[53b.4\]]de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka 
[\[53b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam 
[\[53b.6\]]gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor 
[\[53b.7\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka byams pa chen po ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka snying rje chen po ni btags 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad ni btags pa tsam mo/_btags pa tsam gang 
[\[54a.2\]]yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de/_gnas 
[\[54a.3\]]brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lan cig 
[\[54a.4\]]phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam 
[\[54a.5\]]gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka dgra bcom pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan 
[\[54a.6\]]to/_/kau shi ka rang byang chub ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa 
[\[54a.7\]]tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal par bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_/gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 
[\[54b.2\]]rgyun tu zhugs pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni 
[\[54b.3\]]chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi 
[\[54b.4\]]ka dgra bcom pa ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka rang sangs rgyas ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid 
[\[54b.5\]]de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi 
[\[54b.6\]]ka yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni btags pa tsam mo/_/btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/_de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bstan to/_/kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa 
[\[54b.7\]]de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal lo/_gang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal ba de gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni btags pa dang yang 'gal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed la chos nyid kyang [{]stond [,]ston [}]
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]to//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po lnga pa/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces

[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la [{]myi [,]mi [}]slobs/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rang bzhin stong

[\[62a.7\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_ci'i phyir na byams pa chen po yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_ci'i phyir na snying rje chen po yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_ci'i phyir na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_ci'i phyir na thams cad shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_ci'i phyir na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_ci'i phyir na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[62b.2\]]mthong /_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo /_/tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo /_/'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo /_/'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo /_/

[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo /_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor bas stong ngo /_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa

[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'du byed stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes 
[\[65b.2\]]pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyis [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyis skye mched drug stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/reg pa stong pa nyid

[\[65b.4\]]stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/srid pa stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/skye ba stong pa nyid kyis skye ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rga shi stong pa nyid kyis rga shi stong pa nyid yang dag 
[\[65b.5\]]par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes

[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_phyi 
[\[66a.2\]]nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_
[\[66a.3\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_'dus ma byas stong 
[\[66a.4\]]pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[66a.5\]]yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos thams cad stong pa 
[\[66a.6\]]nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 
[\[66a.7\]]stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dngos 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyis/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/yang dag 
[\[66b.2\]]par spong ba stong ba nyid kyis/_yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyis/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/dbang po stong pa nyid kyis/_dbang po stong pa nyid 
[\[66b.3\]]yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/stobs stong pa nyid kyis/_stobs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyis/_byang chub kyis yan lag stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/lam stong pa nyid 
[\[66b.4\]]kyis/_lam stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyis/_'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyis/_bsam gtan stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su 
[\[66b.5\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyis/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 
[\[66b.6\]]ngo /_/rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyis/_rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyis/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su 
[\[66b.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyis/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/mngon 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bar shes pa stong pa nyid kyis/_mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyis/_ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyis/_
[\[67a.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyis/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa stong pa nyid yang 
[\[67a.3\]]dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyis/_so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/byams pa chen po stong pa nyid kyis/_byams pa chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/snying 
[\[67a.4\]]rje chen po stong pa nyid kyis/_snying rje chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[67a.5\]]kyis/_thams cad shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis/_
[\[67a.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/kau shi ka de ltar gang stong pa nyid 'di la [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob pa de ni gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pas stong pa nyid la slob pa ste/_de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis 
[\[67a.7\]]su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du byed stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myig [,]mig [}]stong pa nyid la slob bo/_de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rna ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sna stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lce stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lus stong pa nyid la slob 
[\[67b.2\]]bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sgra stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par dri stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par ro 
[\[67b.3\]]stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par reg stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par chos stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rna ba'i rnam par shes 
[\[67b.4\]]pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis 
[\[67b.5\]]su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sna'i 'dus te 
[\[67b.6\]]reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de 
[\[67b.7\]]gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[68a.2\]]yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sa'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par chu'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/
[\[68a.3\]]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rlung gi khams stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par ma rig pa stong 
[\[68a.4\]]pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du byed stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par skye mched 
[\[68a.5\]]drug stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par reg pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par tshor ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sred pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par len pa stong pa nyid la 
[\[68a.6\]]slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par srid pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par skye ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rga shi stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la 
[\[68a.7\]]slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par phyi stong pa nyid stong 
[\[68b.2\]]pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par don dam pa stong pa 
[\[68b.3\]]nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis 
[\[68b.4\]]su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par chos thams 
[\[68b.5\]]cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/
[\[68b.6\]]de gnyis su byar med par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par yang dag par 
[\[68b.7\]]spong ba stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par dbang po stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par stobs stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par byang chub kyi yan lag stong 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lam stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par bsam gtan stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par tshad med pa stong pa nyid la slob 
[\[69a.2\]]bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[69a.3\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[69a.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis 
[\[69a.5\]]su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par byams pa chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par snying rje chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par thams cad shes pa nyid 
[\[69a.6\]]stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar med par lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_
[\[69a.7\]]bam po drug pa/_kau shi ka gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_'du shes stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_'du byed stong pa nyid la 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_rna ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_sna stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[69b.2\]]par slob pa dang /_lce stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_lus stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_yid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_sgra 
[\[69b.3\]]stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_dri stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_ro stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_reg stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_chos stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar 
[\[69b.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_
[\[69b.5\]]lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 
[\[69b.6\]]stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[69b.7\]]slob pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa 
[\[70a.2\]]nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_sa'i khams stong pa 
[\[70a.3\]]nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_chu'i khams stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_rlung gi khams stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_nam 
[\[70a.4\]]mkha'i khams stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_ma rig pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_'du byed stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[70a.5\]]par slob pa dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_skye mched drug stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_reg pa stong pa nyid la gang 
[\[70a.6\]]gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_tshor ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_sred pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_len pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_srid pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar 
[\[70a.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_skye ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_rga shi stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su 
[\[70b.2\]]byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 
[\[70b.3\]]gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_'dus byas 
[\[70b.4\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la 
[\[70b.5\]]gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_rang gi 
[\[70b.6\]]mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang 
[\[70b.7\]]gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]slob pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_dbang po stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_stobs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid la gang gnyis

[\[71a.3\]]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar

[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par slob pa de ni/_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par bzod pa'i

[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par dbang po rnams la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par stobs rnams la slob bo/_/de ni

[\[72a.3\]]slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam par thar pa rnams la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par mthar kyis

[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pa nyid la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rang byang chub la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sangs rgyas nyid la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo/_/de ni gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo/_/

[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]nyid la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gang slob pa dang gnyis 
[\[73a.2\]]su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par yang dag par spong ba rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par dbang po rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par stobs rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis

[\[73a.4\]]la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam par thar pa rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar 
[\[73a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]par mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par shes pa rnams la gang

[\[73a.7\]]'jigs pa rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par byams pa chen po la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par snying rje chen po la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gang 
[\[73b.2\]]slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par dgra bcom pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rang byang chub la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sangs rgyas nyid la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /_gnyis 
[\[73b.3\]]su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gang slob pa de ni/_gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la slob bo/_/gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gang slob pa de ni/_gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang /_
[\[73b.4\]]'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/tshor ba 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/'du shes 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/'du byed 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/rnam par shes 
[\[73b.5\]]pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/rna ba 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/sna 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_lce 
[\[73b.6\]]'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/lus 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/yid 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/

[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]chos 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/sna'i 
[\[74a.2\]]rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/lce'i rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/yid kyi rnam par

[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang /_'grib par bya

[\[84a.2\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /[ {]myed [,]med [}]par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/tshor ba yongs su gzung ba dang /[ {]myed [,]med [}]par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob bo/_/'du shes yongs su

[\[87a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob pa yin/_ci'i phyir na/_chos yongs su gzung ba dang /[ {]myed [,]med [}]par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/_ci'i phyir na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang /[ {]myed [,]med [}]par bya ba'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob pa yin/_ci'i phyir na/_
