[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i 
[\[90b.2\]]'dus te reg pa la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa la sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg 
[\[90b.3\]]pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa la lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la lus kyi 
[\[90b.4\]]'dus te reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 
[\[90b.5\]]ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi 
[\[90b.6\]]nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sna'i 'dus te 
[\[90b.7\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la lce'i 'dus te 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la lus kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[91a.2\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yongs su 
[\[91a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sa'i khams la sa'i khams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir chu'i khams la chu'i

[\[91a.6\]]shes pa'i khams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma rig pa

[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs la [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug la yongs su 'dzin pa

[\[91b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar bzod 
[\[91b.7\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]kyi phyir/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[92a.6\]]nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa/_nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la

[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang

[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar yang dag

[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]de ni 'di ltar gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar rnam par

[\[93b.4\]]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la 
[\[93b.5\]]yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la ting nge 
[\[93b.6\]]'dzin rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la 
[\[93b.7\]]yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]phyir/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la so so yang 
[\[94a.2\]]dag par rig pa rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir byams pa chen po la byams pa chen po yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi 
[\[94a.3\]]nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir snying rje chen po la snying rje chen po yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[94a.4\]]rnams yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad shes pa nyid la thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs 
[\[94a.5\]]su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad 
[\[94a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dzin to/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[94a.7\]]pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba yin nam/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_tshe dang 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/smras 
[\[94b.2\]]pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /[ {]myed [,]med [}]par bya ba'i phyir bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_
[\[94b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_gzugs kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_'gag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_blang ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_dor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_/kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_rnam

[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis [{]myed [,]med [}]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_'gag pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_blang ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_dor ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[105b.2\]]mthong /_rnam par byang ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /[ {]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_'bri ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_'grib pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_'phel ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[105b.3\]]cing [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_blang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_rnam 
[\[105b.4\]]par byang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /[ {]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'bri ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'grib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'phel ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byung ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo /_/
[\[105b.5\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa gang nas btsal bar bya/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[105b.6\]]ti'i bus smras pa/_lha'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab 'byor kyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces 
[\[105b.7\]]smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab 'byor kyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o zhes smras te/_de ni khyod kyi 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]mthu'o/_/khyod kyi byin kyi rlabs so/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka 'di ni bdag gi mthu ma yin/_'di ni bdag gi byin kyi rlabs ma yin no/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'on de su'i mthu/_de su'i 
[\[106a.2\]]byin kyi rlabs/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad byin kyi rlabs [{]myed [,]med [}]na ci'i phyir/_de skad du 
[\[106a.3\]]'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin kyi rlabs so/_zhes smra/_byin gyi rlabs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_de bzhin nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[106a.4\]]pa yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rab 'byor kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni de bzhin te/_byin kyi rlabs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]la/_de bzhin nyid las gud na yang de bzhin

[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang brtson 'grus 
[\[111b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam

[\[111b.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[111b.5\]]chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[111b.6\]]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[111b.7\]]kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang phyi stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang phyi nang 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de

[\[113b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[113b.2\]]stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po dgu pa/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin

[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[115a.2\]]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting 
[\[115a.3\]]nge 'dzin kyi de bzhin nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la yang ting nge 'dzin kyi de bzhin nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la

[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /_thog ma

[\[167a.7\]]smras so/_/btsun pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di ni che ba ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'o/_/btsun pa rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/
[\[167b.2\]]btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po/_/'thob 
[\[167b.3\]]bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams kyis ni phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa rnams 
[\[167b.4\]]kyis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rang byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[167b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/_sems can yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon 
[\[167b.6\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/byang 
[\[167b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/_rgyun tu 
[\[168a.2\]]zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyis ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams kyis ni/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob 
[\[168a.3\]]bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/_rang byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par 'tshang bya'o/_/mngon 
[\[168a.4\]]par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[168a.5\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin 
[\[168a.6\]]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu 
[\[168a.7\]]phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'du shes rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[168b.2\]]po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[168b.3\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[168b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rna ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub

[\[168b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka lus rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka yid rgya che ba'i

[\[169a.3\]]rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau 
[\[169a.4\]]shi ka sgra rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sgra'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[169a.5\]]kau shi ka dri rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dri'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi

[\[169a.7\]]reg rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg gi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]kau shi ka chos rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[169b.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi

[\[169b.4\]]ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin

[\[170a.1\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par

[\[170a.3\]]ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu 
[\[170a.4\]]phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub

[\[170a.6\]]'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau 
[\[170b.2\]]shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[170b.3\]]rnams kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg 
[\[170b.4\]]pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_

[\[170b.6\]]ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[170b.7\]]rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi 
[\[171a.2\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[171a.3\]]kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sa'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha 
[\[171a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka chu'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[171a.5\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams rgya che ba'i phyir/_/byang 
[\[171a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rlung gi 
[\[171a.7\]]khams rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka nam mkha'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi 
[\[171b.2\]]ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes 
[\[171b.3\]]pa'i khams kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka ma rig pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[171b.4\]]na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'du byed rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin 
[\[171b.5\]]te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha 
[\[171b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[171b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka skye 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]mched drug rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[172a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka reg pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[172a.3\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka tshor ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 
[\[172a.4\]]'di ltar tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sred pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che 
[\[172a.5\]]ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka len pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[172a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[172a.7\]]kau shi ka srid pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/_pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka skye ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[172b.2\]{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rga shi rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[172b.3\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha 
[\[172b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba 
[\[172b.5\]]yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[172b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka brtson 'grus 
[\[172b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_
[\[173a.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[173a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 
[\[173a.4\]]nang stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[173a.5\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[173a.6\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi nang 
[\[173a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[173b.2\]]pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[173b.3\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i 
[\[173b.4\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[173b.5\]]kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i 
[\[173b.6\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 
[\[173b.7\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[174a.2\]]stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_
[\[174a.3\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi 
[\[174a.4\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[174a.5\]]na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[174a.6\]]rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i 
[\[174a.7\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]so/_/kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi 
[\[174b.2\]]ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[174b.3\]]pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_
[\[174b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[174b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/kau shi ka yang dag 
[\[174b.6\]]par spong ba rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_
[\[174b.7\]]dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sngon gyi 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka dbang po rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[175a.2\]]kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka stobs rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_
[\[175a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha 
[\[175a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang 
[\[175a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam gyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/kau 
[\[175a.6\]]shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' 
[\[175a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/kau shi ka bsam gtan rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi sngon gyi 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 
[\[175b.2\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/kau shi ka gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba 
[\[175b.3\]]yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka rnam par thar pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[175b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka mthar kyis gnas 
[\[175b.5\]]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_
[\[175b.6\]]phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_
[\[175b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka mngon par shes pa rgya che 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_
[\[176a.2\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i 
[\[176a.3\]]mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo'i sngon gyi 
[\[176a.4\]]mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[176a.5\]]kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka mi 'jigs pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[176a.6\]]pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi [{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[176a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka snying 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]rje chen po rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs[,]dmigs[}]/_dbus mi dmigs 
[\[176b.2\]]so/_/kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i sngon gyi mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[176b.3\]]dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs/_dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs so/_/kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di 
[\[176b.4\]]ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya 
[\[176b.5\]]che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgya che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[176b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/_phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_dbus mi dmigs so/_/kau shi ka 
[\[176b.7\]]rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzugs tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad ni dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du 
[\[177a.2\]]gzugs kyi tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_gzugs tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[177a.3\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba'i tshad kyang 
[\[177a.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'du shes tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol 
[\[177a.5\]]tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du shes kyi tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du 'du shes kyi tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam 
[\[177a.6\]]mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_'du shes tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du shes tshad med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'du byed tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[177a.7\]]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du 'du byed kyi tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]'du byed tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/'du byed tshad med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[177b.2\]]zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir 
[\[177b.3\]]rnam par shes pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rnam par shes pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_
[\[177b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[177b.5\]{]myig [,]mig [}]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka rna ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi 
[\[177b.6\]]ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i tshad ni dmigs su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du rna ba'i tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_rna ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba tshad 
[\[177b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka sna tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i tshad 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du sna'i tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/_sna tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/sna tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_
[\[178a.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka lce tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau

[\[181b.1\]]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba tshad med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i

[\[182a\]]

[\[182b\]]

[\[183a\]]

[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du reg 
[\[184a.2\]]pa'i tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_reg pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/reg pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[184a.3\]]rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba'i tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_
[\[184a.4\]]nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshor ba tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka sred pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[184a.5\]]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du sred pa'i tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i

[\[184a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha'i tshad ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du len pa'i tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_len pa 
[\[184b\]]

[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi tshad kyang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes 
[\[191a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka rnam par thar pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi tshad ni

[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]nam mkha' dpag pa ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi dpag pa yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir mig dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu

[\[200b.1\]]nam mkha'i khams dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/ko'u shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]

[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]dpag pa yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_skye mched drug dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/skye mched drug dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka reg pa dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir/_byang

[\[201b.7\]]dpag pa ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' dpag pa ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du sred pa'i dpag pa yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_nam mkha' dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i phyir sred pa dpag tu 
[\[202a\]]

[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi dpag pa ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' dpag pa ni [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su

[\[212a.1\]]shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rna ba
