[\[212b.2\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka ro mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ro'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka reg mtha' 
[\[212b.3\]]yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg gi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka chos mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[212b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[212b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[212b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[212b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka lus kyi rnam 
[\[213a.2\]]par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi 
[\[213a.3\]]ka yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[213a.4\]]so/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtha' dang 
[\[213a.5\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[213a.6\]]mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te 
[\[213a.7\]]reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg 
[\[213b.2\]]pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te 
[\[213b.3\]]reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[213b.4\]]kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[213b.5\]]mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[213b.6\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[213b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang /_
[\[214a.2\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus 
[\[214a.3\]]te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di 
[\[214a.4\]]ltar sa'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka chu'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 
[\[214a.5\]]chu'i khams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]
[\[214a.6\]]khams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khams 
[\[214a.7\]]kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[214b.2\]]khams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka ma rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[214b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'du byed mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'du byed kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau 
[\[214b.4\]]shi ka rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 
[\[214b.5\]{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi 
[\[214b.6\]]ka skye mched drug mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug gi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka reg pa 
[\[214b.7\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar reg pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka tshor ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshor ba'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sred pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[215a.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sred pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka len pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[215a.3\]]chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar len pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka srid pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu 
[\[215a.4\]]phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar srid pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka skye ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' 
[\[215a.5\]]yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar skye ba'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rga shi mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de 
[\[215a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rga shi'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_
[\[215a.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[215b.2\]]po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[215b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas 
[\[215b.4\]]pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha 
[\[215b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau 
[\[215b.6\]]shi ka nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka phyi 
[\[215b.7\]]stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[216a.2\]]kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[216a.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus 
[\[216a.4\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 
[\[216a.5\]]mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'dus 
[\[216a.6\]]byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di 
[\[216a.7\]]ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa 
[\[216b.2\]]ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_
[\[216b.3\]]'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu 
[\[216b.4\]]phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[216b.5\]]rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[216b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[216b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong 
[\[217a.2\]]pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[217a.3\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[217a.4\]]so/_/kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[217a.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtha' dang 
[\[217a.6\]]dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[217a.7\]]kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka dbang po mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyi mtha' 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[217b.2\]]so/_/kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus 
[\[217b.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i 
[\[217b.4\]]lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 
[\[217b.5\]]de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka bsam gtan mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[217b.6\]]kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[217b.7\]]kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[218a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]mthard [,]mthar [}]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mtha' yas pa'i 
[\[218a.3\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 
[\[218a.4\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid 
[\[218a.5\]]dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka mngon par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[218a.6\]]zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de 
[\[218a.7\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka gzungs kyi sgo mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas 
[\[218b.2\]]pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[218b.3\]]pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol 
[\[218b.4\]]tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[218b.5\]]po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar byams pa chen po'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[218b.6\]]rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar snying rje chen po'i mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[218b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid mtha' 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar thams cad shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka 
[\[219a.2\]]lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[219a.3\]]so/_/kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[219a.4\]]kyi mtha' dang dbus [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa dang /_tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /_'du shes mtha' yas pa dang /_'du 
[\[219a.5\]]byed mtha' yas pa dang /_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]mtha' yas pa dang /_rna ba mtha' yas pa dang /_sna mtha' yas pa dang /_lce mtha' yas pa dang /_lus mtha' yas pa dang /_yid mtha' yas pa dang /_gzugs mtha' yas 
[\[219a.6\]]pa dang /_sgra mtha' yas pa dang /_dri mtha' yas pa dang /_ro mtha' yas pa dang /_reg mtha' yas pa dang /_chos mtha' yas ba dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /_sna'i rnam 
[\[219a.7\]]par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /_rna ba'i 'dus te 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /_rna ba'i 
[\[219b.2\]]'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas ba dang /_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /_yid kyi 'dus te 
[\[219b.3\]]reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /_sa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang /_chu'i khams mtha' yas pa dang /[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams mtha' yas pa dang /_rlung gi khams mtha' yas pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[219b.4\]]shes pa'i khams mtha' yas pa dang /_ma rig pa mtha' yas pa dang /_'du byed mtha' yas pa dang /_rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs mtha' yas pa dang /_skye mched drug mtha' yas pa dang /_reg pa mtha' yas pa dang /_
[\[219b.5\]]tshor ba mtha' yas pa dang /_sred pa mtha' yas pa dang /_len pa mtha' yas pa dang /_srid pa mtha' yas pa dang /_skye ba mtha' yas pa dang /_rga shi mtha' yas pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /_
[\[219b.6\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa 
[\[219b.7\]]dang /_nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[220a.2\]]mtha' yas pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid mtha' yas 
[\[220a.3\]]pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtha' 
[\[220a.4\]]yas pa dang /_dbang po rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtha' yas pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_
[\[220a.5\]]bsam gtan rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad mtha' yas pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[220a.6\]]dgu mtha' yas pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mtha' yas pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams mtha' yas pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtha' 
[\[220a.7\]]yas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtha' yas pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mtha' yas pa dang /_byams pa chen po mtha' yas pa dang /_snying rje chen po mtha' yas pa 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad mtha' yas pa dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtha' yas pa dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid mtha' 
[\[220b.2\]]yas pa dang /_rang byang chub mtha' yas pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtha' yas pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[220b.3\]]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brgya byin kyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[220b.4\]]mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[220b.5\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang chos [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[220b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na chos [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang 
[\[220b.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[221a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[221a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i phyir [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mtha' yas 
[\[221a.4\]]so/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so/_/kau shi ka de bzhin nyid dang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/_/kau shi 
[\[221a.5\]]ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_
[\[221a.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_'di lta ste sems can sems can zhes bya ba de chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_/
[\[221a.7\]]brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]kyang me yin te/_'di ltar sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]par [{]mying [,]ming [}]du btags 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par ming du btags pa'o/_/rab [{]'byord [,]'byor [}]kyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_
[\[221b.2\]]rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de la/_sems can mtha' yas pa yod de/_kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[221b.3\]]ma snyed du bzhugs te/_sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_de la sems can gang yang skye ba 'am/_'gag par gyur pa yod dam/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thog ma 
[\[221b.4\]]nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_kau shi ka de ltar rnam grangs des na/_sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/_/de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang 
[\[221b.5\]]tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_skyes pa dang bud [{]myed [,]med [}]du bcas pa dag gis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de gang gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i don du de 
[\[221b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bshad cing brjod de/_bstan pa'i chos 'di ni kye ma legs par bshad do/_/kye ma chos 'di legs par bshad do/_/kye ma chos kyi chos nyid ni legs par bshad do/_/bcom ldan 
[\[221b.7\]]'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi'o/_/chos gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis te/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba 'am/_
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam/_rna ba 'am/_sna 'am/_lce 'am/_lus sam/_yid dam/_gzugs sam/_sgra 'am/_dri'am/_ro 'am/_reg gam/_chos sam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa 'am 
[\[222a.2\]]rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'am/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lce'i 'dus 
[\[222a.3\]]te reg pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis 
[\[222a.4\]]tshor ba 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/_sa'i khams sam/_chu'i khams sam/[ {]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams sam/_rlung gi khams sam/_nam mkha'i khams sam/_rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[222a.5\]]sam/_ma rig pa 'am/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa'am/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs sam/_skye mched drug gam/_reg pa'am/_tshor ba'am/_sred pa'am/_len pa'am/_srid pa'am/_skye ba'am/_rga shi'am/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]du [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'am/_tshul 
[\[222a.6\]]khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong 
[\[222a.7\]]pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa 
[\[222b.2\]]nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/_
[\[222b.3\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar pa rnams sam/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/_rnam par thar 
[\[222b.4\]]pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'am/_mngon par shes pa rnams sam/_ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams sam/_so so yang 
[\[222b.5\]]dag par rig pa rnams sam/_byams pa chen po 'am/_snying rje chen po 'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra 
[\[222b.6\]]bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub 'am/_thams cad shes pa nyid dam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/_chos gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su ma mchis kyis kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa mchis te/_
[\[222b.7\]]gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]no/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/chos gang yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su [{]myed [,]med [}]de/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed dam/_rnam par shes pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gam/_rna ba 'am/_sna 'am/_lce 'am/_lus sam/_yid dam/_

[\[223a.3\]]'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_sna'i 'dus te reg pa'am/_lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/_lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/_yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'am/_rna ba'i 'dus te

[\[223a.6\]]'am/_sred pa 'am/_len pa 'am/_srid pa 'am/_skye ba 'am/_rga shi 'am/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[223a.7\]]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'am/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'am/_nang stong pa nyid dam/_phyi stong pa nyid dam/_phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/_chen po stong pa nyid dam/_don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/_'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/_'dus 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]ma byas stong pa nyid dam/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[223b.2\]]stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dam/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/_yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/_dbang po 
[\[223b.3\]]rnams sam/_stobs rnams sam/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'am/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/_bsam gtan rnams sam/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams sam/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms

[\[223b.6\]]'dres pa rnams sam/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/_dgra bcom pa nyid dam/_rang byang chub bam/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[223b.7\]]pa nyid dam/_chos gang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]mod kyi/_theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa yang yod de/_gsum gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar shes rab 
[\[224a.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du 
[\[224a.3\]]yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha 
[\[224a.4\]]rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[224a.5\]]so/_/nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[224a.6\]]stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/chen po stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus byas stong 
[\[224a.7\]]pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[224b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams

[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par thar pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam par 
[\[225a.2\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams las gzhan 
[\[225a.3\]]du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[225a.4\]]'jigs pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/byams pa chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/
[\[225a.5\]]snying rje chen po las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/thams cad shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[225a.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du yang de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]so//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu 
[\[225a.7\]{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po bcu bdun pa/_/lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos 'di dag thams cad la slob ste/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la slob bo/_/tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la slob bo/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo/_/nang stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/phyi stong pa nyid la 
[\[225b.2\]]slob bo/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/chen po stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/mtha' las 
[\[225b.3\]]'das pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[225b.4\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob bo/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob bo/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob bo/_/
[\[225b.5\]]rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la slob bo/_/dbang po rnams la slob bo/_/stobs rnams la slob bo/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob bo/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob bo/_/
[\[225b.6\]]bsam gtan rnams la slob bo/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la slob bo/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo/_/rnam par thar pa rnams la slob bo/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob bo/_/
[\[225b.7\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la slob bo/_/mngon par shes pa rnams la slob bo/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams la slob bo/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]la slob bo/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la slob bo/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob bo/_/byams pa chen po la slob bo/_/snying rje chen po la slob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo/_/rgyun tu zhugs 
[\[226a.2\]]pa'i 'bras bu la slob bo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo/_/phyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu la slob bo/_/dgra bcom pa nyid la slob bo/_/rang byang chub la slob bo/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob bo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[226a.3\]]nyid la slob bo/_/lha'i bu dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral bar spyod pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/_lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe/_nga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[226a.4\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi zham 'bring byed cing /_rgyal po'i khab pad+mo yod pa'i nang gi tshong dus kyi dbus na 'dug pa'i tshe/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[226a.5\]]tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]
[\[226a.6\]]pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/phyi stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/chen po stong pa nyid dang bral bar 
[\[226a.7\]]ma gyur to/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/thog ma dang 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur 
[\[226b.2\]]to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[226b.3\]]pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/dbang po rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/stobs rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 
[\[226b.4\]]dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/bsam gtan rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/gzugs 
[\[226b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/rnam par thar pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[226b.6\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/mngon par shes pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang bral bar 
[\[226b.7\]]ma gyur to/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/byams pa chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/snying rje chen po dang bral bar ma gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]dang yang bral bar ma gyur te/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to/_/lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[227a.2\]]mar me mdzad kyis nga la khye'u khyod ni/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa na/_bskal pa bzang po'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[227a.3\]]mkhyen pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[227a.4\]]byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di de ltar gzugs [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i

[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_dbang po rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_stobs rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i

[\[228b.3\]]ba'i tshul dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[228b.4\]]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor

[\[228b.6\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshul dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]len [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dor ba'i tshuld gyis/_
[\[228b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]'khor bzhi dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bu dang /_mtshe ma'i lha'i bu dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang /_'phrul 
[\[229a.2\]]dga'i lha'i bu dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha'i bu dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha'i bu dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha'i bu dang /_snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /_chung snang gi lha'i bu dang /_
[\[229a.3\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha'i bu dang /_dge ba'i lha'i bu dang /_chung dge'i lha'i bu dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha'i bu dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha'i bu dang /_che ba'i lha'i bu dang /_chung che'i lha'i bu dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha'i bu 
[\[229a.4\]]dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha'i bu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha'i bu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha'i bu dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i bu dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha'i bu dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen nas/_de dag thams cad 
[\[229a.5\]]dpang du btsugs te/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma 'am/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[229a.6\]]'am/_lha'i bu 'am/_lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_sgom pa dang /_gzhan la rgya cher 'chad pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad 
[\[229a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'bral ba de dag ni/_bdud sdig can dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/_gzugs 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_tshor ba stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_'du shes stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_'du byed stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_rnam par shes
