[\[270a.3\]]yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/_rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]las 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 
[\[270a.4\]]'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]las dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]las bla ma'i cha'i kun 
[\[270a.5\]]tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]las rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]las bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[270a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang rnam par thar pa'i 
[\[270a.7\]]sgo gsum thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang so so yang dag par 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]rig pa bzhi thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/_/rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches 
[\[270b.2\]]nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams bsrabs pa'i slad du/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]

[\[270b.7\]]rtsa bdun thob pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bar gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]de bas kyang dgra bcom par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs 
[\[271a.2\]]pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang byang chub tu spyod par gyur pa de lta bu ni ches nyung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/_sangs rgyas ma mthong ba dang /_chos ma thos pa dang /_dge 'dun bsnyen ma bkur 
[\[271a.3\]]ba dang /_sbyin pa ma byin pa dang /_tshul khrims ma bsrungs pa dang /_bzod pa ma bsgoms pa dang /_brtson 'grus ma brtsoms pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams ma bsgoms pa dang /_shes rab ma bsgoms pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 
[\[271a.4\]]ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_bsam 
[\[271a.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid ma thos 
[\[271a.6\]]ma bsgoms pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_
[\[271a.7\]]'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_dngos po 
[\[271b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_yang 
[\[271b.3\]]dag par spong ba rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_dbang po rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_stobs rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma thos ma 
[\[271b.4\]]bsgoms pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams ma thos ma 
[\[271b.5\]]bsgoms pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_

[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_snying rje chen po ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid ma thos ma bsgoms pa dang /_lam gyi

[\[272a.3\]]ldan pa dang /_chos la mos pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]phyed pa dang ldan pa dang /_dge 'dun la mos pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]phyed pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/_de bas kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa ches nyung ngo /_/de bas kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa

[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]chub tu spyod pa ni ches nyung bar rig par bya'o/_/kau shi ka [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams lta zhog gi_/de ji snyam du sems/_'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 
[\[272b.2\]]thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de lta bu ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam 
[\[272b.3\]]bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/_rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang /_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang /_dam pa ma yin pa'i

[\[272b.5\]]bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nem nur [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la nem nur [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams 
[\[272b.6\]]las mar shes pa dang /_phar shes pa dang /_dge sbyong du shes pa dang /_bram zer shes pa dang /_rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang /_sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims srung ba dang /_gso sbyin la gnas pa dang /_'dod pa la 
[\[272b.7\]]kha na ma tho bar 'du shes shing /_rnam par spyod pa dang /_de bzhin du [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad du mngon par dga' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'du shes pa ni ji snyed 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]cig yod/_'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags rnams las bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ni ji snyed cig yod/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[273a.2\]]gi srog chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang /_so so yang 
[\[273a.3\]]dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang /_kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i slad du/_rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang /_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i slad du/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar 
[\[273a.4\]]gyur pa dang /_dam pa ma lags pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bar gyur pa dang /_bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i slad du/_dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /_rang byang chub tu zhugs pa de lta bu ni shin tu 
[\[273a.5\]]nyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni de bas kyang ches nyung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de de bzhin 
[\[273a.6\]]no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi srog chags las byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum thob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa dang /_
[\[273a.7\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dang /_kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/_rgyun tu zhugs pa thob pa dang /_'dod chags 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir/_lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang /_dam pa ma yin pa'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs ba'i phyir/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong bar gyur pa dang /_bla ma'i cha'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/_dgra bcom 
[\[273b.2\]]par gyur pa dang /_rang byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de lta bu ni nyung ste/_de bas kyang gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de lta bu ni ches

[\[273b.4\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i 
[\[273b.5\]]sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/_de las phal cher nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_
[\[273b.6\]]bsam pa zhan pa/_mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/_/kau shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[273b.7\]]dag na/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/_de las phal cher nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson

[\[274a.3\]]na/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par

[\[274a.6\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan bas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/_de las 
[\[274a.7\]]phal cher nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bsam pa zhan pa/_mos pa dma' ba/_
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/_/kau shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs 
[\[274b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/_de las phal cher 
[\[274b.3\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bsam pa zhan pa/_mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal 
[\[274b.4\]]ba can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/_/kau shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi/_spyan bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[274b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/_de las phal cher nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[274b.6\]]kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bsam pa zhan pa/_mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub 
[\[274b.7\]]par dka'o/_/kau shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/_de las phal cher nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[275a.2\]]rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bsam pa zhan pa/_/mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis 
[\[275a.3\]]bsgrub par dka'o/_/kau shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[275a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi de las phal cher nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[275a.5\]]kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bsam pa zhan pa/_mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis 
[\[275a.6\]]bsgrub par dka'o/_/kau shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[275a.7\]]byang chub tu spyod kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/_de las phal cher nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bsam pa zhan pa/_mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal pa can rnams kyis bsgrub par 
[\[275b.2\]]dka'o/_/kau shi ka ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas/_steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod kyang /_
[\[275b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pas/_de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi/_de las phal cher nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba mthong ngo /_/
[\[275b.4\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni le lo can/_brtson 'grus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bsam pa zhan pa/_mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal ba can rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o/_/kau shi ka de bas na/_rigs kyi 
[\[275b.5\]]bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag myur zhing /_bde bar bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod na/_yang dang yang du 
[\[275b.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mnyan par bya'o/_/gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag par bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di gzung zhing /_bcang ba 
[\[275b.7\]]dang /_klag cing kun chub pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bya zhing bris te/_me tog dang /_bdug spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan mang pos rim gror bya'o_/
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bkur stir bya'o/_/phu dud du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/dge ba'i chos gang ji snyed pa gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus te/_de dag kyang gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_klag par bya/_kun chub 
[\[276a.2\]]par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya ste/_'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[276a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong 
[\[276a.4\]]pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[276a.5\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_
[\[276a.6\]]stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[276a.7\]]bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gang 
[\[276b.2\]]ji snyed/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag par bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs 
[\[276b.3\]]kyi bu mo de dag 'di ltar shes par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu 
[\[276b.4\]]phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[276b.5\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos 
[\[276b.6\]]thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang 
[\[276b.7\]]dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang /_
[\[277a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[277a.3\]]chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad po 'di dag dang /_gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag la bslab par mdzad kyi/_bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag 
[\[277a.4\]]cag gi ston pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i bar du yang bdag cag gi ston pa ste/_de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa'o/_/rang sangs rgyas dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_
[\[277a.5\]]lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis bstan pa yang 'di yin te/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob slob pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa 
[\[277a.6\]]dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob slob pa dang /_nang stong 
[\[277a.7\]]pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_dor pa med pa stong pa nyid 
[\[277b.2\]]la slob slob pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la 
[\[277b.3\]]slob slob pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang 
[\[277b.4\]]pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_dbang po rnams la slob slob pa dang /_stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob slob pa dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[277b.5\]]bden pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_mthar 
[\[277b.6\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la slob slob pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la 
[\[277b.7\]]slob slob pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_byams pa 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]chen po la slob slob pa dang /_snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob slob pa dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang /_
[\[278a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob slob pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa 
[\[278a.3\]]rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/_/pha rol tu phyin to/_/pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung /_
[\[278a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub 
[\[278a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bsam gtan gyi pha rol 
[\[278a.6\]]tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la 
[\[278a.7\]]brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten 
[\[278b.2\]]yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang 
[\[278b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka sbyin pa'i 
[\[278b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de 
[\[278b.5\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la 
[\[278b.6\]]brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/
[\[278b.7\]]de dag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[279a.2\]]chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[279a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis don dam pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di 
[\[279a.4\]]ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[279a.5\]]na/_kau shi ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis 'dus ma byas 
[\[279a.6\]]stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye 
[\[279a.7\]]dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan 
[\[279b.2\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[279b.3\]]na/_kau shi ka dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis rang bzhin 
[\[279b.4\]]stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye 
[\[279b.5\]]dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[279b.6\]]po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[279b.7\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]ka [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag 
[\[280a.2\]]gis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_/lha dang 
[\[280a.3\]{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[280a.4\]]po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan 
[\[280a.5\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de 
[\[280a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/
[\[280a.7\]]de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[280b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis dbang po rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka dbang po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[280b.3\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis stobs rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan 
[\[280b.4\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir 
[\[280b.5\]]zhe na/_kau shi ka byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis 'phags 
[\[280b.6\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha 
[\[280b.7\]]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no de dag gis bsam gtan rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bsam gtan 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs 
[\[281a.2\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'di dag ni 
[\[281a.3\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten 
[\[281a.4\]]par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i 
[\[281a.5\]]bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis rnam par thar pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rnam par thar pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin 
[\[281a.6\]]te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos 
[\[281a.7\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'di dag ni/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi 
[\[281b.2\]]rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[281b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[281b.4\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 
[\[281b.5\]]gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yan te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 
[\[281b.6\]]la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye 
[\[281b.7\]]dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka so so yang dag par rig pa 'di dag ni nyan 
[\[282a.2\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis snying rje chen po la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka 
[\[282a.3\]]snying rje chen po 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[282a.4\]]pa rnams la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[282a.5\]]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[282a.6\]]dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_
[\[282a.7\]]rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no/_/de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brten par bya ste/_de ci'i 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/_lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no//_//
[\[282b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gcig pa/_//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/_rin 
[\[282b.3\]]po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/_de la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas 
[\[282b.4\]]kyi chos gos dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas na/_kau 
[\[282b.5\]]shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[282b.6\]]stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya 
[\[282b.7\]]cher ston cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral la/_gong du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed na/_bsod nams de ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la 
[\[283a.2\]]la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_mchod pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la 
[\[283a.3\]]nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[283a.4\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas na/_kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i 
[\[283a.5\]]bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes 
[\[283a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral la/_gong du me tog dang /_
[\[283a.7\]]phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed na/_bsod nams 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]de ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya 
[\[283b.2\]]ngan las 'das nas/_mchod pa'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas 
[\[283b.3\]]kyi [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[283b.4\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas na/_kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod 
[\[283b.5\]]nams mang du 'phel lam/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi 
[\[283b.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' 
[\[283b.7\]]dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas 
[\[284a.2\]]mchod pa'i phyir/_stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas 
[\[284a.3\]]kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[284a.4\]]sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas na/_kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_/brgya byin gyis gsol 
[\[284a.5\]]pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[284a.6\]]'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang

[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]bkang ba lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas 
[\[284b.2\]]pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma 
[\[284b.3\]]dang /_lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod 
[\[284b.4\]]par byas na/_kau shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom 
[\[284b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/_gang shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul 
[\[284b.6\]]bzhin du yid la byed cing /[ {]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_
[\[284b.7\]]phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/kau shi ka 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po stong gnyis pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka gal te 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_mchod pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun pas 
[\[285a.2\]]byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/_rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/_de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_

[\[285a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par byed/_'chang bar byed/_klog par byed kun chub par byed tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /[ {]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_phreng ba 
[\[285a.6\]]dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed na/_bsod nams ches mang du 
[\[285a.7\]]'phel lo/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten kyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag 
[\[285b\]]

[\[285b.4\]]pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar byas te/_de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na

[\[286a\]]

[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di'i nang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/_'di ltar dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_sbyin pa'i
