[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_thams cad shes pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[289a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus so/_/de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa ste/_de la bslabs shing 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad 
[\[289a.3\]]kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/_/phyin to/_/phyin par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad do//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 
[\[289a.4\]]dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mod dag gi_/bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing /_glegs 
[\[289a.5\]]bam du byas te/_'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /_gong du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan 
[\[289a.6\]]dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas na/_de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed[,]med[}]/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[289a.7\]]khyab/_mtshungs pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_
[\[289b.2\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba 
[\[289b.3\]]ni/_nang stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_phyi stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_phyi nang stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/_/shes 
[\[289b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_chen po stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_don dam pa stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_'dus byas stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[289b.5\]]phyin pa las byung ba ni/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/shes 
[\[289b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/shes 
[\[289b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_dran pa 
[\[290a.2\]]nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_yang dag par spong ba rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_
[\[290a.3\]]dbang po rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_stobs rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_'phags 
[\[290a.4\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_bsam gtan rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba 
[\[290a.5\]]ni/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_rnam par thar pa rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[290a.6\]]pa las byung ba ni/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[290a.7\]]tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_mngon par shes pa rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_ting nge 'dzin rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]phyin pa las byung ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/_/shes 
[\[290b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_byams pa chen po'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_snying rje chen po'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/_/shes rab 
[\[290b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_sems can yongs su smin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha 
[\[290b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_thams cad shes pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha 
[\[290b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/_theg pa chen po'o/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[290b.6\]]las byung ba ni/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/_glegs bam du byas shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog 
[\[290b.7\]]pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/_/
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas na/_bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_
[\[291a.2\]]bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dper yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro/_/rgyur yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[291a.3\]]tu phyin pa 'di ji srid du/_'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du sangs rgyas dkon mchog nub par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/chos dkon mchog nub par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de srid du dge ba bcu'i las 
[\[291a.4\]]kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[291a.5\]]mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 
[\[291a.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[291a.7\]]nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chen po stong /_
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtha' 
[\[291b.2\]]las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig 
[\[291b.3\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos 
[\[291b.4\]]po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 
[\[291b.5\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs rnams 
[\[291b.6\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten 
[\[291b.7\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]ro/_/rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mthar kyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[292a.2\]]smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[292a.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[292a.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig 
[\[292a.5\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[292a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mtshe 
[\[292a.7\]]ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 
[\[292b.2\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 
[\[292b.3\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dge rgyas kyi lha 
[\[292b.4\]]rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu che ba'i 
[\[292b.5\]]lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[292b.6\]]gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams 
[\[292b.7\]]dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung ba yod do/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod do/_/sems can yongs su smin pa yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do/_de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[293a.2\]]khams 'di na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /_mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang /_'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris 
[\[293a.3\]]kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha rnams dang /_snang ba'i lha rnams dang /_chung snang gi lha rnams dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha 
[\[293a.4\]]rnams dang /_dge ba'i lha rnams dang /_chung dge'i lha rnams dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang /_che ba'i lha rnams dang /_chung che'i lha rnams dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha 
[\[293a.5\]]rnams dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha gang ji snyed yod pa de dag la/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/_grogs po 
[\[293a.6\]]dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bar bya'o/_/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcang bar bya'o/_/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag par bya'o/_/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub par 
[\[293a.7\]]bya'o/_/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byas 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]pas ni/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/chos kyi tshul rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun 'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun ma chad la/_grogs po dag chos kyi tshul 
[\[293b.2\]]rgyun ma chad de/_grogs po dag dge 'dun gyi tshul rgyun ma chad na/_sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[293b.3\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[293b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[293b.5\]]chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[293b.6\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig 
[\[293b.7\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos po 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 
[\[294a.2\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs rnams 
[\[294a.3\]]'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[294a.4\]]ro/_/bsam gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig 
[\[294a.5\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mngon 
[\[294a.6\]]par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[294a.7\]]ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten du 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi 'ong 
[\[294b.2\]]ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyi da 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[294b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zungs shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub bar gyis shig_/kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[294b.4\]]tu phyin pa 'di tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka nam lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems shing /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang 'thab mo bya'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang tsham bsngal lo snyam na/_
[\[294b.5\]]de'i tshe kau shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yid kyis soms la kha ton gyis shig_/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig dang /_des lha ma yin gyi bsam pa de dag phyir nub par 'gyur te/_sems bskyed pa de dag zlos shing /_
[\[294b.6\]]rnam par 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu dang lha'i bu mo gang dag shi 'pho ba'i tshe/_nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong na yang /_kau shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton du gyis shig dang /_de dag gis 
[\[294b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas/_lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/_gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_mthar kyis bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[295a.2\]]chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig byung 
[\[295a.3\]]ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs nas/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[295a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[295a.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang 
[\[295a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan 
[\[295a.7\]]thos kyi chos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rigs sngags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa 
[\[295b.2\]]dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o/_/dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[295b.3\]]kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_de de bzhin te/_kau shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rig sngags so/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste/_shes rab 
[\[295b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig byung ba de dag 
[\[295b.5\]]kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang rig 
[\[295b.6\]]sngags 'di nyid la brten te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[295b.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rig sngags 'di nyid la brten te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]rig sngags 'di yod na/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 
[\[296a.2\]]'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[296a.3\]]phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_nang stong pa 
[\[296a.4\]]nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_don dam pa stong pa 
[\[296a.5\]]nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[296a.6\]]'jig rten na yod pa yin/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_
[\[296a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_dran pa nye bar 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_byang chub 
[\[296b.2\]]kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/[ {]mthard [,]mthar [}]kyis 
[\[296b.3\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa med pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[296b.4\]]rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 
[\[296b.5\]]'jig rten na yod pa yin/_byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_yang 
[\[296b.6\]]dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_chos nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_
[\[296b.7\]]chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_chos skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]'jig rten na yod pa yin/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_rang byang chub 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa 
[\[297a.2\]]yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/_
[\[297a.3\]]kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_gzugs 
[\[297a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[297a.5\]]pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su 
[\[297a.6\]]yod pa yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa 
[\[297a.7\]]yin/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]su yod pa yin/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_dor ba 
[\[297b.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na 
[\[297b.3\]]gdags su yod pa yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[297b.4\]]ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na 
[\[297b.5\]]gdags su yod pa yin/_dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 
[\[297b.6\]]'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig 
[\[297b.7\]]rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rnam par thar ba'i stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_ting nge 'dzin rnams 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams 'jig 
[\[298a.2\]]rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa 
[\[298a.3\]]yin/_thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rgyun tu zhugs pa 
[\[298a.4\]]'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_rang sangs rgyas 'jig 
[\[298a.5\]]rten na gdags su yod pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin no/_/kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/_rtsi dang rgyu skar dang /_
[\[298a.6\]]skar ma thams cad gdags su yod do/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/_dge ba'i spyod pa dang /_yang dag pa'i spyod pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_bsam gtan dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[298a.7\]]pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs kyi sgo dang /_stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rtsa 
[\[298b.2\]]thams cad gdags su yod do/_/slob pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]slob pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu skar dang /_skar ma thams cad kyang gdags su yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[298b.3\]]kyang 'jig rten na yod par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can rnams la 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das 
[\[298b.4\]]pa'i chos ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_theg pa chen po rnams te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan 
[\[298b.5\]]pas/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[298b.6\]]spyod pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_
[\[298b.7\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dor ba 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po 
[\[299a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[299a.3\]]gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang /_stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 
[\[299a.4\]]spyod pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[299a.5\]]'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la spyod pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams la 
[\[299a.6\]]spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang /_snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[299a.7\]]rnams la spyod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi sar [{]myi [,]mi [}]ltung ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed pa dang /_sems can yongs su smyin par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang /_tshe phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sems can phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[299b.2\]]pa nyid rjes su thob par byed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung bar rig par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang 
[\[299b.3\]]ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag dang /_tshe rabs gzhan kyi yon tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[299b.4\]]'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur ba 
[\[299b.5\]]lags/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[299b.6\]]byed pa de/_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par dug gis dus byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/mtshon gyis dus byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/myes dus byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/chus dus byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba nas/_nad brgya rtsa 
[\[299b.7\]]gcig gi bar gyis dus byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/rgyal po dang /_blon pos gnod par bya ba zhig byung ba las/_gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang du 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]song na/_de la glags tshol ba de dag gis glags [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnyed de/_rgyal po'i bu dang /_rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang gtam dri ba dang /_gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[300a.2\]]zhe na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang /_mthus de ltar sems so/_/gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha ton byed cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/_de 
[\[300a.3\]]la rgyal po'i bu 'am/_rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam dri ba dang /_gtam bya bar sems shing /_dga' bar bya bar sems par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am 
[\[300a.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag_/snying rje'i sems dang /_dga' ba'i sems dang /_btang snyoms kyi sems nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs 
[\[300a.5\]]kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/_tshe 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gyi 
[\[300a.6\]]yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_pha rol tu 
[\[300a.7\]]phyin pa drug dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /_lam rnams dang /_'phags pa'i 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]bden pa rnams dang /_bsam gtan rnams dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa rnams dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[300b.2\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnams dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams dang /_so so yang dag 
[\[300b.3\]]par rig pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bya ba'i smon lam gyi dbang ma gtogs par nam yang sems can dmyal bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_byol song gi skye gnas su [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[300b.4\]]skye/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye'o/_/de nam yang yan lag nyams pa can du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_nam yang dbul po'i rigs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye/_smyig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/_smye sha can gyi rigs sam/_mgar ba 'am/_phyag dar ba 'am/_shen pa 
[\[300b.5\]]'am/_phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/_dmangs rigs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ste/_rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/_'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 
[\[300b.6\]]'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/_nam yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang 'bral bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba 
[\[300b.7\]]dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_chos nyan pa'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/_de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smyin par byed/_sangs 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/_/kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_
[\[301a.2\]]klag par bya/_kun chub par bya/_tshul bzhin du yid la bya/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byas te/_de dag ni nam bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[301a.3\]]bar du/_tshe 'di'i yon tan dang /_tshe rabs gzhan gyi yon tan/_de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa las/_le'u bcu dgu'o//_//de 
[\[301a.4\]]nas mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun tu rgyu ba/_glags lta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam zhig_/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ba dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun 
[\[301a.5\]]tu rgyu ba brgya po glags lta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag_/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong na/_de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pas/_mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong 
[\[301a.6\]]nas/_bar chad byed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du bya'o snyam nas/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha 
[\[301a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha ton du brjod do/_/de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas lam de nyid dang /_sgo de nyid nas phyir 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]dong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du gyur te/_de ltar mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis rgyang ring po ring po nas/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_lam de nyid dang /_sgo de nyid nas phyir dod na 
[\[301b.2\]]de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_shes 
[\[301b.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsams pas/_de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/_nga la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_lam de nyid dang /_sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no/_/sha ra dwa 
[\[301b.4\]]ti'i bu mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam la yang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/_mu stegs can gzhan dang /_kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa glags lta 
[\[301b.5\]]ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/_'khor 'dir 'ong bar sems pa sha stag kyang /_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs par bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na gang shes rab 
[\[301b.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_zhe sdang ba'i sems sam/_glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro ba ma mthong ste/_de ni gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[301b.7\]]rten gyi khams 'di na/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_
[\[302a.2\]]'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang ji 
[\[302a.3\]]snyed cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa las byung ba sha stag go/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 
[\[302a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha 
[\[302a.5\]]dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi'am [,]mi'am [}]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[302a.6\]]na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed 
[\[302a.7\]]cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 
[\[302b.2\]]dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma 
[\[302b.3\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha 
[\[302b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang 
[\[302b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes 
[\[302b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go_/byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_
[\[302b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi 
[\[303a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs 
[\[303a.3\]]rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis 
[\[303a.4\]]kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[303a.5\]]ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_
[\[303a.6\]]lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab 
[\[303a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 
[\[303b.2\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs 
[\[303b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[303b.4\]]nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[303b.5\]]pa las byung ba sha stag go_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[303b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[303b.7\]]pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo /_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go_/de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon tu gyur/_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha 'di dag kyang mngon du gyur pa las 'dir ni gdon mi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[304a.2\]]chen po rnams/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur gyis/_de la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/_bar chad bya'o/_snyam nas bdud sdig to can gyis/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag 
[\[304a.3\]]bzhi ba mngon par sprul nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro 'dod par gyur pa dang /_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/kye ma bdud sdig to can 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mngon par sprul 
[\[304a.4\]]cing /_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro bar 'dod la bdud sdig to can gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi rnam par bkod pa 'di ni rgyal po bim bi sa ra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod/_rgyal 
[\[304a.5\]]po sde rab tu 'pham byed dang /_shAkya rnams dang /_lid tsa byi rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]phod de/_bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la yang glags lta zhing /_glags 
[\[304a.6\]]tshol/_sems can yang dag par brtson pa rnams la yang gtse ba'i bsam pa can yin gyis/_bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o/_/dran pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin 
[\[304a.7\]]gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par bsams te/_dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]de dag lam de nyid dang /_sgo de nyid nas phyir log go_/de nas 'khor de na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_na bza' mang po mngon par sprul nas/_bar snang gi 
[\[304b.2\]]nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor nas/_tshig 'di skad du brjod do/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yun ring por spyod 
[\[304b.3\]]par gyur cig_/'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]'di dag ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du 
[\[304b.4\]]gnas shing /_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de srid du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_phyogs 
[\[304b.5\]]bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur la/_dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing /_dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[304b.6\]]bar 'gyur 'gyur zhe'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur zhe'o/_/phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 
[\[304b.7\]]glegs bam du byas te/_'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/phyogs de ni mgon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi bar gyi 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa de

[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/_/gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ji snyam du sems/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod

[\[308a.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ji snyam du sems/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan 
[\[308a.4\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ji snyam du sems/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[308a.5\]]phyin pa yin nam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar 
[\[308a.6\]]yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su 
[\[308a.7\]]bsdos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]su bsngos pa'i shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[308b.2\]]pa yin no/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]skye ba'i tshul dang /_mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/_/gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

[\[309a\]]

[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnams gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul 
[\[311a.2\]]dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_snying rje chen po gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_lan 
[\[311a.3\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rang byang chub gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[311a.4\]]pa'i byang chub gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis so/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar 'du shes gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[311a.5\]]ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rna ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar sna gnyis su ma 
[\[311a.6\]]mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar lce gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar yid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar sgra 
[\[311a.7\]]gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar dri gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar ro gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar reg gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar chos gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]ji ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma 
[\[311b.2\]]mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rna 
[\[311b.3\]]ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis 
[\[311b.4\]]pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma 
[\[311b.5\]]mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen 
[\[311b.6\]]kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar chu'i khams gnyis su ma 
[\[311b.7\]]mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rlung gi khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rnam par 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]shes pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis 
[\[312a.2\]]pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar skye mched drug gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar 
[\[312a.3\]]sred pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar len pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar srid pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar skye ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rga shi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul 
[\[312a.4\]]dang /_ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar 
[\[312a.5\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar nang 
[\[312a.6\]]stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[312a.7\]]ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis 
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i

[\[312b.3\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

[\[312b.6\]]pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar bsam gtan rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams

[\[313a.1\]]'jug pa dgu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis

[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar len pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar srid pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

[\[316a.4\]]pa 'di dag gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag 
[\[316a.5\]]gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar

[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/_/bsam gtan bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/_/tshad med pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/_

[\[319b.3\]{]mthard [,]mthar [}]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i thog mar 'gro ba ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol

[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa nyid do/_/kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po la sa bon btab pa/_rgyu rkyen tshogs par gyur nas/_rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba yang /_sa chen po ni de dag gi gnas
