[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]bsam gtan rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[320b.2\]]par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par 'phel lo/_/mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par 'phel 
[\[320b.3\]]lo/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/snying rje chen po 
[\[320b.4\]]rnam par 'phel lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/_/thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[320b.5\]]nyid rnam par 'phel te/_kun dga' bo rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa lnga rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_stong pa nyid thams cad rnam 
[\[320b.6\]]par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam 
[\[320b.7\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_dbang po lnga rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]stobs lnga rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 
[\[321a.2\]]rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_bsam gtan bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[321a.3\]]pa nyid la rten cing /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_rnam par 
[\[321a.4\]]thar pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /[ {]mthard [,]mthar [}]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa 
[\[321a.5\]]nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[321a.6\]]rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam 
[\[321a.7\]]pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]snying rje chen po rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/_/
[\[321b.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na/_shes rab 
[\[321b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'di dag yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/rdzu 
[\[321b.4\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/dbang po lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/stobs lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/'phags 
[\[321b.5\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/bsam gtan bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/
[\[321b.6\]]mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/
[\[321b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]su sgrub pa'o/_/snying rje chen po yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/
[\[322a.2\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 
[\[322a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang bdag gis/_bcom ldan 'das las thos te/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par 
[\[322a.4\]]bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las bzung ste/_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_
[\[322a.5\]]kun chub par bgyis pa dang /_spel ba de dag thams cad bka' ma stsal te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_spel ba dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/_dge ba bcu'i 
[\[322a.6\]]las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[322a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 
[\[322b.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur 
[\[322b.3\]]ro/_/chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[322b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa 
[\[322b.5\]]nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[322b.6\]]dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi 'jig 
[\[322b.7\]]rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs lnga 'jig rten du 'byung 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[323a.2\]]rnam par thar pa brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'jig rten du 
[\[323a.3\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa 
[\[323a.4\]]bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 
[\[323a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par bgyis pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 
[\[323a.6\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na 
[\[323a.7\]]mchis so/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/gzhan 'phrul 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/tshangs chen gyi 
[\[323b.2\]]lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/
[\[323b.3\]]dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/chung dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis 
[\[323b.4\]]so/_/chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig 
[\[323b.5\]]rten na mchis so/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung ba 
[\[323b.6\]]dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par bgyis pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/_rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams 
[\[323b.7\]]'jig rten na mchis so/_/dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]phyin pa bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par bgyis pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten 
[\[324a.2\]]du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /_bcangs pa dang /_blags pa dang /_kun chub par byas pa dang /_tshul bzhin 
[\[324a.3\]]du yid la byas pa de'i yon tan ni der zad par yang ma bshad de/_kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_
[\[324a.4\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/_tshul khrims kyi phung po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[324a.5\]]phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang 
[\[324a.6\]]ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[324a.7\]]kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni shes rab kyi phung po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/_rnam par grol pa'i phung po tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[324b.2\]]pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 
[\[324b.3\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_rnam pa 
[\[324b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i don du zhugs par rig par bya'o/_/kau shi ka nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung 
[\[324b.5\]]po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang /_gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes 
[\[324b.6\]]rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po las/_kau shi ka tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po 
[\[324b.7\]]dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'di la ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /_shes rab kyi phung po dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /_rnam par 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos brgya'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba'i char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya'i char 
[\[325a.2\]]yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/grangs su yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/char yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[325a.3\]]'gro'o/_/bgrang bar yang nye bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/dper yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gro'o/_/rgyur yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las/_sems rnam par grol 
[\[325a.4\]]yang chos gang yang yongs su shes pa [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la 
[\[325a.5\]]byed pa de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis de la rim gror byed pa dang /_bkur bstir byed pa dang /_phu dud du byed pa 
[\[325a.6\]]dang /_mchod par byed pa de dag tshe 'di nyid dang /_tshe rabs phyi ma la yon tan de dag rnam pa de bzhin du thob par ngas bshad do/_/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[325a.7\]]'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bgyid pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di bris shing 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid pa dang /_bkur stir bgyid pa dang /_phu dud du bgyid pa dang /_mchod 
[\[325b.2\]]par bgyid pa de la ni bdag gis kyang rtag tu rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[325b.3\]]kha ton du byed pa'i tshe/_lha'i bu brgya stong mang po dga' ba'i yid kyis chos nyan pa'i phyir nye bar 'ongs te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa'i tshe yang /_lha'i bu de dag spobs pa 
[\[325b.4\]]nye bar bsgrub par sems so/_/chos smra ba de dag smra ba snyom par gyur na yang /_lha'i bu de dag chos kyi rim gror de nyid kyis spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par sems te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[325b.5\]]phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs 
[\[325b.6\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /_bkur stir byed pa dang /_phu dud du byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di yang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka 
[\[325b.7\]]gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'khor bzhi la shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa ston pa'i tshe/_la la zhig bdag la [{]glan ka [,]klan ka [}]tshol zhing glags lta bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo /_zhes bya bar zhum pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang ba byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[326a.2\]]pa 'di la ni 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dang /_dge ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba dang /_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang /_nyan thos 
[\[326a.3\]]kyi chos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi gter yin la/_rigs kyi bu 'am 
[\[326a.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo de yang /_nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_don dam 
[\[326a.5\]]pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa 
[\[326a.6\]]dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[326a.7\]]la gnas pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la glags lta ba yang 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa la gang glags lta ba de yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang glags blta bar bya ba de yang yang dag par rjes su [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_de ltar shes 
[\[326b.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la sus kyang glags lta ba [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog 
[\[326b.3\]]cing kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i sems zhum par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_yongs su zhum par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_'jigs par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_sngang bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_skrag par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni 'di ltar 
[\[326b.4\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/_yongs su zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/_'jigs par 'gyur ba 'am/_sngang bar 'gyur ba 'am/_skrag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong 
[\[326b.5\]]ba'i phyir te/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'tshang ba dang klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing de la [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_phreng ba 
[\[326b.6\]]dang spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /_bkur stir byed pa dang /_phu dud du byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa de dag gis tshe 'di'i 
[\[326b.7\]]yon tan 'di dag yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin du 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]yid la byed pa dang /_bris shing de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed pa dang /_

[\[327a.3\]]khams na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun 
[\[327a.4\]]tu zhugs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gis kyang dgos shing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin/_'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang

[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]stir byed pa dang /_phu dud du byed pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa des tshe 'di'i yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro//_//shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_/
[\[328b.2\]]kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_'chang ba der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[328b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_
[\[328b.4\]]tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba 
[\[328b.5\]]dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der dong zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_
[\[328b.6\]]gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/_/gnas gtsang ma'i ris [{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha de dag kyang der dong zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[328b.7\]]klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/_/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs 
[\[329a.2\]]pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che 
[\[329a.3\]]ba'i lha'i bu bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris [{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha dang /_
[\[329a.4\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid che bar bya bar mang po dag kyang der dong zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang 
[\[329a.5\]]kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_gdud pa byas shing phyir 'dong bar sems so/_/kau shi ka de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis kyang sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyal 
[\[329a.6\]]chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen 
[\[329a.7\]]dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung tshe dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris [{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha dang /_de ma yin pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha 
[\[329b.2\]]ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi'am [,]mi'am [}]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gzi brjid chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lhags pa de dag la chos kyi 
[\[329b.3\]]sbyin pa 'di byin bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/_de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_bcang ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_mchod pa byas shing phyag byas te/_gdud pa byas nas phyir 
[\[329b.4\]]'dong ngo /_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_
[\[329b.5\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_snang ba dang /_chung snang dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba dang /_kun snang dang ba dang /_dge ba dang /_chung dge dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[329b.6\]]dge ba dang /_dge rgyas dang /_che ba dang /_chung che dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha'i bu dag dang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[329b.7\]]khams kyi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_mtshe ma'i lha dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha dang /_'phrul dga'i lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha dang /_tshangs lha nye phan 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]gyi lha dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha dang /_snang ba'i lha dang /_chung snang gi lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha dang /_kun snang dang ba'i lha dang /_dge ba'i lha dang /_chung dge'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge 
[\[330a.2\]]ba'i lha dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha dang /_che ba'i lha dang /_chung che'i lha dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha dang /_'bras bu che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha dang /_shin tu mthong ba'i lha dang /_gya nom snang ba'i lha dang /_'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha de dag kyang 
[\[330a.3\]]bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bskyang ba byed de/_kau shi ka de la las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par glags lta ba rnams kyis kyang glags [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnyed de/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di'i yon tan de lta bu dag kyang yongs su 
[\[330a.4\]]zin par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu gang bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang der shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa bya ba dang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab 
[\[330a.5\]]pa dang /_bskyang bar bya ba'i don du 'dong par sems te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ste/_sems can thams cad

[\[330a.7\]]'dir phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_gdud pa dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]bya ba dang /_mchod pa'i phyir rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir mtshe ma'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir dga' ldan gyi lha rnams 'ongs 
[\[330b.2\]]so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha 
[\[330b.3\]]rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir tshangs chen gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir chung snang gi lha 
[\[330b.4\]]rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir dge ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir chung dge'i lha

[\[330b.6\]]zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir mi che ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi dang /_'dir [{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so 
[\[330b.7\]]zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba dang /_'dir 'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams 'ongs so zhes bgyi ba ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/_/bcom 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang du bzhag par snang ba chen po byung bar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mthong na/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des 'dir ni lha 
[\[331a.2\]]mthu bo che mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/_dbang che ba/_gzi brjid che ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_bcang ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_gdud par bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur bstir bya 
[\[331a.3\]]ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa'i phyir lhags so zhes bya ba nges par khong du chud par bya'o/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gtsang sbra'i spyod pa dang ldan na/_de'i gtsang sbra'i spyod pa des lha de dag kyang 
[\[331a.4\]]nye bar 'ongs shing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di klag pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_kun chub par bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod pa byas nas/_shin tu dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur 
[\[331a.5\]]ro/_/gnas de na lha mthu chung ngu ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag kyang lha mthu bo che mthu chen po de dag gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang zil [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzod pa'i phyir gnas de nas gud du 'dong bar sems so/_/ji lta ji ltar lha mthu chen po mthu chen po rdzu

[\[331b.6\]]rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_

[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag gi don rnam par phye ba yang thos par 'gyur ro/_/

[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po chos yang dag par 'gro ba byed cing /_rnam pa

[\[333b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag 
[\[333b.7\]]khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]stong 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i 
[\[334a.2\]]sgra thos par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /_

[\[334a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag 
[\[334a.5\]]khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[334a.6\]]che ge mo zhig na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di 
[\[334a.7\]]snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]zhig na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis 
[\[334b.2\]]bskor cing mdun du byas te/_chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/_de bzhin 
[\[334b.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun 
[\[334b.4\]]du byas te/_chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[334b.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_chos ston to zhes bya ba'i 
[\[334b.6\]]sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo 
[\[334b.7\]]zhig bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_chos ston to zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/_/shar phyogs 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa/_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang 
[\[335a.2\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mchod pa sna tshogs 
[\[335a.3\]]mang pos rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/_
[\[335a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang 
[\[335a.5\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim gror bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_phu dud du bya ba dang /_mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[335a.6\]]nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang 
[\[335a.7\]]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_mchod pa sna

[\[335b.7\]]dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mchod rten rin po che bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang [{]mye [,]me [}]tog dang /_spos dang /_

[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]'byor la spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yid la bya bas yongs su brlan pa la zas la cher chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin/_zas kyi 'du shes chung ba yin/_kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am rigs 
[\[337a.2\]]kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gyur ro/_/zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de la [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pa rnams lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/_/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang /_
[\[337a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/_/lho phyogs

[\[337b.1\]]snyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi'am [,]mi'am [}]ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub

[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo/_/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su bzung bar 
[\[338a.2\]]'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid nan tan tu mnyan par bya'o/_/gzung bar bya'o/_/bcang bar bya'o/_/klag par bya'o/_/kun chub par bya'o/_/tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang 
[\[338a.3\]]yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral bar bya'o/_/kau shi ka de ste rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di ma bzung ma bcangs ma blags/_kun chub par ma byas/_tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na yang /_rigs kyi bu 
[\[338a.4\]]'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil 
[\[338a.5\]]snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o/_/bkur stir bya'o/_/phu dud du bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/kau shi ka de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'gro ba mang po la phan pa dang /_'gro ba mang po la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa

[\[338a.7\]]phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/_bkur stir byed/_phu dud du byed/_mchod par byed na/_rigs kyi bu 'am 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/_phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la nam 
[\[338b.2\]]'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang /_bshos dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/_/bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[338b.3\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas kyang rin po che bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/_nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[338b.4\]]na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod par byas pas ni ma yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]
[\[338b.5\]]pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u nyi shu gcig go/_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba 
[\[338b.6\]]zhig kyang rnyed/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na/_de las gang blang bar bya/_brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 
[\[338b.7\]]gis byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang la las stsal/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las stsal na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gror ma mchis pa yang ma lags/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]rton pa yang ma lags/_btsun par [{]myi [,]mi [}]bgyid pa yang ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[339a.2\]]gdung la rim gror bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'tshal ba 'am/_bkur stir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/_phu dud du bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'tshal ba 'am/_mchod par bgyi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'tshal ba yang ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de 
[\[339a.3\]]dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror bgyi ba lags/_bkur stir bgyi ba lags/_phu dud du bgyi ba lags/_mchod par bgyi ba lags/_sku gdung de dag 
[\[339a.4\]]ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bsgrubs pa ste/_de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga' ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_lha rdzas kyi 
[\[339a.5\]]phreng ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos dang /_lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang /_lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis 
[\[339a.6\]]rim gror bgyid cing /_bkur stir bgyid pa dang /_phu dud du bgyid pa dang /_mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung 'di gshegs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba lags pas na/_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma 
[\[339a.7\]]yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gror bgyi ba lags/_bkur stir bgyi ba lags/_phu dud du bgyi ba lags/_mchod par bgyi ba lags pas bsrung zhing rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod par bgyid do/_/
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzung du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bltar [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di 
[\[339b.2\]]ltar mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yin na/_de la khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_bltar [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/_'di ltar mtshan nyid [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gzung bar sems/_de 
[\[339b.3\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dzin pa dang /_dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/_'grib pa'i phyir ma yin/_'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/_bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/_bskyung ba'i phyir ma yin/_dbri ba'i phyir ma yin/_
[\[339b.4\]]bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin/_rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sbyin 
[\[339b.5\]]par byed pa ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_slob pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_
[\[339b.6\]]'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye 
[\[339b.7\]]bar sgrub pa ma yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_phyi 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_
[\[340a.2\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nye bar 
[\[340a.3\]]sgrub pa ma yin/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 
[\[340a.4\]]stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_yang dag par spong ba rnams nye bar sgrub pa 
[\[340a.5\]]ma yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye 
[\[340a.6\]]bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_bsam gtan rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma 
[\[340a.7\]]yin/_rnam par thar pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_mngon 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_gzungs kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa 
[\[340b.2\]]ma yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_lan 
[\[340b.3\]]cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dgra bcom pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_
[\[340b.4\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 
[\[340b.5\]]nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_nyan thos kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa 
[\[340b.6\]]ma yin/_slob pa dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/_sbyin 
[\[340b.7\]]pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_bsam gtan 
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_phyi stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_phyi nang stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_
[\[341a.2\]]stong pa nyid stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_chen po stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'dus byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_mtha' las 
[\[341a.3\]]'das pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rang bzhin stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa

[\[341a.5\]]stong pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_yang dag par spong pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dbang po rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_
[\[341a.6\]]stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_byang chub kyi yan lag rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_bsam gtan 
[\[341a.7\]]rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rnam par thar pa brgyad nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]'jug pa dgu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_mngon par shes pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_ting nge 'dzin rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_gzungs 
[\[341b.2\]]kyi sgo rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_snying rje chen po nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_
[\[341b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_dgra bcom pa 
[\[341b.4\]]nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rang byang chub nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar sgrub pa ma yin no/_/zhes bya bar shes pa de ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[341b.5\]]pa la spyod pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su 
[\[341b.6\]]shes par bya ba ma yin te/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 
[\[341b.7\]]gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_kau shi ka legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin 
[\[342a.2\]]te/_ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma 
[\[342a.3\]]yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/bzod pa'i pha

[\[342a.5\]]phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'o/_/kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi 
[\[342a.6\]]dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis 
[\[342a.7\]]su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang brtson 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/

[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]phyin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de 
[\[343a.2\]]ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[343a.3\]]kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_de bzhin nyid la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de

[\[343a.5\]]'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_

[\[343a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su 
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de la 
[\[343b.2\]]gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[343b.3\]]pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 
[\[343b.4\]]'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod 
[\[343b.5\]]du zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar med do/_/kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod

[\[344a.1\]]gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings de la gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]de gnyis su byar med do/_/kau shi ka gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/_bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do/_/de

[\[344b.1\]]lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/_der lha'i bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag kun kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid de/_nam bdag der ma mchis shing stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe yang lha'i

[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_chos thams cad la mtshan

[\[348a.3\]]mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_rtags ma mchis pa dang /_brjod du ma mchis pa dang /_smos su ma mchis pa'i chos [{]myi [,]mi [}]bstan te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/_rtags ma mchis/_brjod du ma

[\[348a.6\]]'das de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/_lha dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_

[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kun chub pa dang /_
[\[348b.2\]]tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /_de bris shing me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_sbos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/_bkur stir bgyid/_
[\[348b.3\]]phu dud du bgyid/_mchod par bgyid na/_de ni nam bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/byol song gi skye gnas dang /_
[\[348b.4\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can yongs su 
[\[348b.5\]]smin par bgyi ba dang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'bral bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[348b.6\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa bgyid cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum 
[\[348b.7\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa zhig kyang stsal la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang bris te stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las/_bdag ni 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 
[\[349a.2\]]gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang /_bkur stir bgyi ba dang /_phu dud du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de dag la rim gror bgyis/_bkur stir bgyis/_phu dud du bgyis/_mchod par 
[\[349a.3\]]bgyis na log par ltung ba dang /_ngan song du mchi bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_lha dang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]phun sum tshogs pa myong nas/_smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[349a.4\]]rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe 
[\[349a.5\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su ma mchis te/_gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[349a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/_mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi dang /_'di ltar 'das 
[\[349a.7\]]pa dang /_skyes pa'i rabs dang /_shin tu rgyas pa dang /_chos rmad du byung ba dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa dang /_chos gtan la bab pa bstan pa gsungs te bshad pa dang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab 
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/_gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

[\[349b.4\]]dang /_lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[349b.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[349b.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[349b.7\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/_mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /_lung bstan pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_ched du brjod pa dang /_gleng gzhi

[\[350a.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung zhing /_kun chub par bgyis te/_gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa bgyis pa yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'dra ba ma mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di

[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_de la me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan

[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad do/_/'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/_de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'thob bo/_/'di las byung ba ni

[\[351b.4\]]rnams kyis/_glags rnyed par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas/_mthar kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas

[\[351b.7\]]ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/_nor bu rin po che chen po de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma lags pa rnams kyis glags [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnyed do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa 'am bud [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]kyang nor bu rin po che de bstan na/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bzod de/_myur du 'pho zhing [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas so/_/mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/_

[\[352a.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa'i bros btab pa'i lus la/_nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/_'dus pa'i bro de yang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phel lo/_/nub mo ni snang bar bgyid do/_/tsha ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che 
[\[352a.4\]]chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do/_/grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro bar bgyid do/_/nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs 
[\[352a.5\]]de yang ha cang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]dro/_/ha cang yang [{]myi [,]mi [}]grang zhing /_ran pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/_/nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phyogs der sbrul lam de ma lags pa'i sdig pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[352a.6\]]pa gdug pa gzhan dag kyang rgyu bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am/_bud [{]myed [,]med [}]la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la/_nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/_des de mthong ma thag tu dug de yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/

[\[352b.1\]]sna'i nad dam/_lce'i nad dam/_lkog ma'i nad dam/_lus kyi nad ci byung ba las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/_de dag gi 'brum bu'am/_rab rib bam/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]gi nad dam/_rna ba'i nad dam/_sna'i nad dam/_lce'i

[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]rin po che chen po des 'dang ste/_bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni/_yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag dang /_gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

[\[353a.3\]]kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/_'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams la yang yod/_/brgya byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo/_/nor bu rin po che chen po

[\[353a.6\]]'gro'o/_/de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la zhig gi nang du stsal stsal pa las/_snod de nas phyung yang snod de ni nor bu rin

[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]kyi sdug bsngal dang /_gnod pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]las gyur pa 'am/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/

[\[353b.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ci snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni 
[\[353b.4\]]tshad ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/_/bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/_brtson 'grus kyi 
[\[353b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/_/bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/_

[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do/_/bcom ldan 'das

[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa dpri ba dang /_bsnan pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa 'ong ba dang /_'gro
