[\[358b.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid kyis yongs su bsgos pa'o/_/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[358b.4\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su bltam pa lta zhog gi_/bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig_/de 
[\[358b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur bltam pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to/_/de 
[\[358b.6\]]ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga'o/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[358b.7\]]yongs su bsgos pas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga' ste/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang /_bkur stir 
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]bgyid pa dang /_phu dud du bgyid pa dang /_mchod par bgyid pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' [{]myi [,]mi [}]dmigs shing /_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs 
[\[359a.2\]]che zhing mtho ba 'am/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'am/_mtshe ma'i lha 'am/_dga' ldan gyi lha 'am/_'phrul dga'i lha 'am/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du [{]myi [,]mi [}]dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[359a.3\]]bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal kyi mthar 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu ni de tsam du bas gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang /_blags shing 
[\[359a.4\]]kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/_ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[359a.5\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyi stong pa nyid 
[\[359a.6\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs 
[\[359a.7\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/thog ma dang 
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_
[\[359b.2\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[359b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[359b.4\]]rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam 
[\[359b.5\]]yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[359b.6\]]gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[359b.7\]]rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs 
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su 
[\[360a.2\]]rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de ched du bsams te lus yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/lus de dag gis 
[\[360a.3\]]sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/_'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/_bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/_khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho bar skyes pa'i lus sam/_brgya byin gyi gzugs 
[\[360a.4\]]sam/_tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/_ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/_lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das te/_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon 
[\[360a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]par 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs nas/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[360a.6\]]du mchi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags/_glo ba mches pa yang ma mchis/_mchod par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'tshal ba yang ma lags/_gzung bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[360a.7\]]'tshal ba yang ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis/_rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod pa bgyis na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bstsags pa lags/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang /_rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_phu dud dang /_mchod par bgyis par 'gyur 
[\[360b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa 
[\[360b.3\]]de dag chos kyi sku dang /_gzugs kyi sku dang /_ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing /_mchod par 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung bar bgyi/_bcang bar bgyi/_klag par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi/_
[\[360b.4\]]mchod par bgyi/_gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/_tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ste/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des ni/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang /_tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[360b.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des/_chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/_/
[\[360b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/_
[\[360b.7\]]bcang bar bgyi/_klag par bgyi/_kun chub par bgyi/_mchod par bgyi/_gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/_chos nyid tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos 
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]nyid de/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /_'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas chos rnams kyis chos nyid gang lags she na/_nang stong pa nyid 
[\[361a.2\]]kyi ye shes dang /_phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid 
[\[361a.3\]]kyi ye shes dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid 
[\[361a.4\]]kyi ye shes dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes 
[\[361a.5\]]dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ye shes dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /_dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang /_
[\[361a.6\]]stobs lnga'i ye shes dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ye shes dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /_bsam gtan bzhi'i ye shes dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi'i ye 
[\[361a.7\]]shes dang /_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa

[\[361b.3\]]zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /_'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/_'dus byas kyi chos 
[\[361b.4\]]rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o/_/de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/_de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /_'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /_gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis 
[\[361b.5\]]pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /_'phel ba ma mchis pa dang /_'grib pa ma mchis ba ste/_de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/_

[\[361b.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing /_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par 
[\[362a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 
[\[362a.3\]]bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /_chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/_bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[362a.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /_ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /_da ltar byung 
[\[362a.5\]]ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/
[\[362a.6\]]'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/_/'thob bo/_/
[\[362a.7\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /_da ltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag na/_rang sangs 
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/_rang byang chub thob po/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 
[\[362b.2\]]theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag kyang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_skye ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_'gag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par byang ba 
[\[362b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_'dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_dbri ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_bsnan pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_blang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul dang /_spang ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[362b.4\]]bstan te/_de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/_don dam par ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 
[\[362b.5\]]tshul rol ma yin/_pha rol ma yin/_thang du 'dug pa ma yin/_gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/_mnyam pa ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mnyam pa ma yin/_mtshan ma ma yin/_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin/_'jig rten pa ma yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa ma 
[\[362b.6\]]yin/_'dus byas ma yin/_'dus ma byas ma yin/_dge ba ma yin/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dge ba ma yin/_'das pa ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa ma yin/_da ltar byung ba ma yin te/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[362b.7\]]rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_kau shi 
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha 
[\[363a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa ni/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu drug pa/_/
[\[363a.3\]]brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/_
[\[363a.4\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa yang 'tshal te/_sems can du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/sems can du gdags par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/bdag tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/sems can du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma

[\[363a.7\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/tshor bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/'du shes su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/'du byed du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/rnam par shes par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/rna bar 
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/snar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/lcer [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/lus su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/yid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/gzugs su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/sgrar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis 
[\[363b.2\]]so/_/drir [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/ror [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/reg tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/chos su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi rnam par shes par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs 
[\[363b.3\]]pa ma mchis so/_/sna'i rnam par shes par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/lce'i rnam par shes par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/lus kyi rnam par shes par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/yid kyi rnam par shes par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis 
[\[363b.4\]]so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/lus kyi 
[\[363b.5\]]'dus te reg par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs 
[\[363b.6\]]pa ma mchis so/_/sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis 
[\[363b.7\]]so/_/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/sa'i khams su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/chu'i khams su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]khams su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/rlung gi khams 
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/nam mkha'i khams su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/ma rig par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/'du byed du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa 
[\[364a.2\]]ma mchis so/_/rnam par shes par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/[{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/skye mched drug tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/reg par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/tshor bar [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/

[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]so/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/

[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]rnams su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/snying rje chen por [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma mchis so/_/

[\[366b.7\]]stobs lnga [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_bsam 
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]gtan bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul

[\[371b.5\]]bstan pa de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[371b.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa 
[\[371b.7\]]nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]

[\[372a.1\]]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/_la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus

[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang /_gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[376b.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[376b.3\]]don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[376b.4\]]chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[376b.5\]]pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par 
[\[376b.6\]]thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[376b.7\]]thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[377a.2\]]glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 
[\[377a.3\]]chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 
[\[377a.4\]]yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod 
[\[377a.5\]]do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun 
[\[377a.6\]]snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[377a.7\]]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams 
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[377b.2\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu 
[\[377b.3\]{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus 
[\[377b.4\]]ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod 
[\[377b.5\]]do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod 
[\[377b.6\]]do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/
[\[377b.7\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/
[\[378a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras 
[\[378a.3\]]bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad 
[\[378a.4\]]mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub 
[\[378a.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can 
[\[378a.6\]]rnams lta zhog gi/_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can/_ji snyed cig yod pa de dag/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi 
[\[378a.7\]]ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/_de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[378b.2\]]kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/
[\[378b.3\]]'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi 'ong 
[\[378b.4\]]ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to 'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob 
[\[378b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[378b.6\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang /_gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[378b.7\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 
[\[379a.2\]]dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa 
[\[379a.3\]]nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang 
[\[379a.4\]]chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo 
[\[379a.5\]]stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so 
[\[379a.6\]]so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag 
[\[379a.7\]]kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 
[\[379b.2\]]yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[379b.3\]]dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha 
[\[379b.4\]]rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung 
[\[379b.5\]]dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 
[\[379b.6\]]yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha 
[\[379b.7\]]rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[380a.2\]]phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das 
[\[380a.3\]]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong 
[\[380a.4\]]pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag bar spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 
[\[380a.5\]]yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/
[\[380a.6\]]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[380a.7\]]ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod 
[\[380b.2\]]do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba 
[\[380b.3\]]rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[380b.4\]]yod do//_//shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[380b.5\]]'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel 
[\[380b.6\]]lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs 
[\[380b.7\]]bam bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher 
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/
[\[381a.2\]]'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/
[\[381a.3\]]'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon 
[\[381a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go_/'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 
[\[381a.5\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang /_gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[381a.6\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[381a.7\]]'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa 
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong 
[\[381b.2\]]ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_tshad 
[\[381b.3\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon 
[\[381b.4\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_
[\[381b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau 
[\[381b.6\]]shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas de'i bsod nams 
[\[381b.7\]]ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas rgyas rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams 
[\[382a.2\]]yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha 
[\[382a.3\]]rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung 
[\[382a.4\]]dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[382a.5\]]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[382a.6\]]rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi 
[\[382a.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[382b.2\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 
[\[382b.3\]]nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag 
[\[382b.4\]]par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i 
[\[382b.5\]]bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 
[\[382b.6\]]dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[382b.7\]]rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong 
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu 
[\[383a.2\]]zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod 
[\[383a.3\]]do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[383a.4\]]khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 
[\[383a.5\]]'phel lam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[383a.6\]]pa 'di'i glegs bam bri ba dang /_klag pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[383a.7\]]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob 
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra 
[\[383b.2\]]bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[383b.3\]]dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs 
[\[383b.4\]]par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[383b.5\]]phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[383b.6\]]chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[383b.7\]]dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam 
[\[384a.2\]]yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[384a.3\]]mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres 
[\[384a.4\]]pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs 
[\[384a.5\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de 
[\[384a.6\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim 
[\[384a.7\]]bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams 
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams 
[\[384b.2\]]yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas 
[\[384b.3\]]kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu 
[\[384b.4\]]mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[384b.5\]]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 
[\[384b.6\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 
[\[384b.7\]]yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid 
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po 
[\[385a.2\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/
[\[385a.3\]]dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad 
[\[385a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan 
[\[385a.5\]]ma med pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_
[\[385a.6\]]so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[385a.7\]]bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir 
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[385b.2\]]rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab 
[\[385b.3\]]tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[385b.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu' ma/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel 
[\[385b.5\]]lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par 
[\[385b.6\]]zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 
[\[385b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang 
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur 
[\[386a.2\]]ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag 
[\[386a.3\]]kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes 
[\[386a.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong 
[\[386a.5\]]pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[386a.6\]{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 
[\[386a.7\]]dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i 
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[386b.2\]]pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms 
[\[386b.3\]]chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag 
[\[386b.4\]]pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_chos thams cad 
[\[386b.5\]]rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[386b.6\]]sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[386b.7\]]tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung 
[\[387a.2\]]che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha 
[\[387a.3\]]rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes 
[\[387a.4\]{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam 
[\[387a.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong 
[\[387a.6\]]pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong 
[\[387a.7\]]pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo 
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/
[\[387b.2\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa 
[\[387b.3\]]brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod

[\[387b.5\]]brgyad yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[387b.6\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[387b.7\]]dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi [{]myi [,]mi [}]ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las 
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i 
[\[388a.2\]]bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes 
[\[388a.3\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[388a.4\]]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/
[\[388a.5\]]'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid 
[\[388a.6\]]thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_
[\[388a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[388b.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid 
[\[388b.3\]]dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong 
[\[388b.4\]]pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_

[\[388b.6\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge

[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_
[\[389a.2\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[389a.3\]]phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/
[\[389a.4\]]khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i 
[\[389a.5\]]lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha nams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod 
[\[389a.6\]]do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[389a.7\]]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams 
[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes 
[\[389b.2\]]mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[389b.3\]]rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi 
[\[389b.4\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[389b.5\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong
