[\[389b.7\]]par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags 
[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis 
[\[390a.2\]]gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams 
[\[390a.3\]]yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun 
[\[390a.4\]]tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa 
[\[390a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub 
[\[390a.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka gling 
[\[390a.7\]]chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon 
[\[390b\]]
[\[390b.1\]]par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/
[\[390b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod 
[\[390b.3\]]nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/_zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang 
[\[390b.4\]]dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob 
[\[390b.5\]]bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 
[\[390b.6\]]rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug 
[\[390b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[391a.2\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus 
[\[391a.3\]]byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[391a.4\]]rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par 
[\[391a.5\]]spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa brgyad 
[\[391a.6\]]dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi sgo 
[\[391a.7\]]thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang /_rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs 
[\[391b.2\]]bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las 
[\[391b.3\]]chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod 
[\[391b.4\]]do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams 
[\[391b.5\]]yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod 
[\[391b.6\]]do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha 
[\[391b.7\]]rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha 
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]]rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod 
[\[392a.2\]]do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol 
[\[392a.3\]]tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[392a.4\]]chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[392a.5\]]dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo 
[\[392a.6\]]bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs 
[\[392a.7\]]rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs 
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/
[\[392b.2\]]mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/
[\[392b.3\]]snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang 
[\[392b.4\]]byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod 
[\[392b.5\]]do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig 
[\[392b.6\]]rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi_/kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/_bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bzhi dang /_gzugs 
[\[392b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/_kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]mang ngo /_/bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa 
[\[393a.2\]]dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/_
[\[393a.3\]]de dag la bslabs shing /_rigs kyi bu 'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 
[\[393a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/
[\[393a.5\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/_rang byang chub thob par gyur to/_/'thob bo/_/thob par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[393a.6\]]par zhugs par gyur to/_/'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[393a.7\]]rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kau shi ka zag pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[393b\]]
[\[393b.1\]]dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid 
[\[393b.2\]]dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad 
[\[393b.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang 
[\[393b.4\]]dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[393b.5\]]pa brgyad dang /_mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_gzungs kyi 
[\[393b.6\]]sgo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_
[\[393b.7\]]dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po dag ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/_/kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]
[\[394a\]]
[\[394a.1\]]pa glegs bam du bris shing /_klag pa dang /_bri ba dang /_kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/_de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka de ni 'di 
[\[394a.2\]]ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_de dag yod pas/_rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/_/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing 
[\[394a.3\]]mtho ba rnams yod do/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/_/mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/_/dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[394a.4\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/_/tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/_/snang ba'i 
[\[394a.5\]]lha rnams yod do/_/chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dge ba'i lha 
[\[394a.6\]]rnams yod do/_/dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/_/che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/chung che'i lha rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]che ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/
[\[394a.7\]{]myi [,]mi [}]gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/_/'og [{]myin [,]min [}]gyi lha rnams yod do/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/rnam shes 
[\[394b\]]
[\[394b.1\]]mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}]'du shes [{]myed [,]med [}{]myin [,]min [}]skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha [{]rold [,]rol [}]tu [{]phyind [,]phyin [}]pa yod do/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol 
[\[394b.2\]]tu phyin pa yod do/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/_/nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi 
[\[394b.3\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/_/stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/chen po stong pa nyid yod do/_/don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/_/
[\[394b.4\]]mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/thog ma dang tha ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dor ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/_/chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/_/rang gi mtshan nyid 
[\[394b.5\]]stong pa nyid yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa stong pa nyid yod do/_/ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/_/
[\[394b.6\]]yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/_/dbang po rnams yod do/_/stobs rnams yod do/_/byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 
[\[394b.7\]]yod do/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/_/bsam gtan rnams yod do/_/tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams yod do/_/gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/_/mthar 
[\[395a\]]
[\[395a.1\]]kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_smon pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yod do/_/mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/_/ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/_/
[\[395a.2\]]gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/_/[{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/_/snying rje chen po yod do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 
[\[395a.3\]]rnams yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/_/dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/_/rang byang chub yod do/_/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 
[\[395a.4\]]yod do/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/_/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/_/phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]'ong ba rnams yod do/_/dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/_/
[\[395a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//_//_

[\[395a.7\]]//_//_//_//_//
